Entries.471942/f Emily 500/p Emily: none/-1000 -1000/farmer -100 -100 0 Emily 20 4 3/skippable/showFrame Emily 33/specificTemporarySprite EmilySleeping/viewport 19 4 true/emote Emily 24/pause 3000/emote Emily 24/pause 3000/viewport move 0 -1 5000/pause 1000/globalFade .004/viewport -1000 -1000/playMusic EmilyDream/changeToTemporaryMap EmilyDreamscape false/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 1000/warp Emily 21 11/warp farmer 22 15/animate Emily false true 500 24 25/globalFadeToClear .005 true/viewport move 0 -1 7000/viewport 21 18/pause 8000/textAboveHead Emily "阿彌-陀佛"/pause 4000/textAboveHead Emily "阿瀰瀰彌-陀佛"/pause 5000/playSound yoba/move farmer -2 0 0/pause 600/stopAnimation Emily/showFrame Emily 26/jump Emily/shake Emily 1000/pause 1000/showFrame Emily 0/pause 500/move Emily -1 0 2/move Emily 0 1 2/pause 1000/emote Emily 8/pause 500/speak Emily "您怎麼會在這裡？$u"/pause 1000/move Emily 0 2 2/viewport move 0 1 1500/move Emily -1 0 2/move Emily 0 1 1/faceDirection farmer 3/pause 1000/specificTemporarySprite EmilySign/faceDirection Emily 0/pause 2000/faceDirection Emily 2/pause 8000/faceDirection Emily 1/pause 1000/speak Emily "……$u#$b#這讓我想到了一件事。$u#$b#即使最細微、柔和、單純的光線中也會藏有一個奇妙的秘密。"/pause 1000/speak Emily "現在我知道你為什麼在這裡了。這是一個跡象。哈哈哈！$h"/pause 1000/emote farmer 8/startJittering/pause 1000/playSound coin/stopJittering/warp farmer -1000 -1000/pause 500/faceDirection Emily 2/pause 50/faceDirection Emily 3/pause 200/faceDirection Emily 0/pause 500/faceDirection Emily 1/pause 1000/faceDirection Emily 2/viewport move -1 -1 5000/pause 2000/globalFade .005/viewport -2000 -2000/pause 3000/changeLocation HaleyHouse/warp Emily 20 4/globalFadeToClear .005 true/viewport 20 3/pause 3000/move Emily -2 0 2/move Emily 0 3 2/pause 2000/speak Emily "@……有些特別的@……$u#$b#我們的命運將交織在一起……$u"/pause 1500/end
Entries.195019/f Haley 2500/f Emily 2500/f Penny: playful/-1000 -1000/farmer 8 19 1 Haley 18 18 1 Emily 19 17 2 Penny 20 17 2 Maru 21 17 2 Leah 22 18 3 Abigail 20 20 0/pause 1000/message "出於某些原因，你決定把手放到口袋裡..."/pause 500/message "你摸著兔子的腳，感覺如釋重負..."/move farmer 5 0 1 true/viewport 17 19 true/move false/pause 500/faceDirection Haley 3 true/faceDirection Emily 3 true/faceDirection Penny 3 true/faceDirection Maru 3 true/faceDirection Leah 3 true/faceDirection Abigail 3 true/textAboveHead Haley "嗨！"/textAboveHead Abigail "嘿！"/textAboveHead Leah "看誰來了！"/pause 2000/move farmer 4 0 1/emote farmer 32/pause 500/speak Abigail "我們剛才在聊劉易斯鎮長和瑪妮的八卦...$h"/pause 500/speak Penny "我個人覺得他們之間沒有什麼內情…"/pause 500/speak Haley "哈！你太天真了吧？$h"/jump Penny/emote Penny 12/fade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 1500/message "你和女生小團體待了一會。"/pause 1000/message "這次聚會無事發生！"/pause 500/end
Entries.195012/f Haley 2500/f Emily 2500/f Penny: playful/-1000 -1000/farmer 8 19 1 Haley 18 18 1 Emily 19 17 2 Penny 20 17 2 Maru 21 17 2 Leah 22 18 3 Abigail 20 20 0 Pierre -1000 -1000 1/move farmer 5 0 1 true/viewport 17 19 true/move false/pause 500/startJittering/faceDirection farmer 2 true/animate farmer false true 100 94/jump farmer/pause 2000/stopAnimation farmer/showFrame farmer 0/stopJittering/playSound thudStep/faceDirection farmer 3 true/showFrame farmer 7 true/startJittering/faceDirection Haley 3 true/faceDirection Emily 3 true/faceDirection Penny 3 true/faceDirection Maru 3 true/faceDirection Leah 3 true/faceDirection Abigail 3 true/textAboveHead Haley "別跑那麼快！"/textAboveHead Abigail "別動！"/textAboveHead Leah "站住！"/pause 3000/stopJittering/showFrame farmer 6 true/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 1/move farmer 3 0 1/playMusic none/emote farmer 28/pause 500/speak Abigail "呵，沒想到你所有的「女朋友」會出現在一個房間裡吧，@?$a"/pause 500/speak Leah "我...我還以為你和其他男人不一樣...$s^你騙取了我們所有人的愛…你真是太可怕了...$a"/pause 500/speak Penny "你怎麼能這樣對我們，@?$s"/pause 500/speak Maru "你真覺得自己是情場高手，是嗎？以為自己游刃有餘、如魚得水？真是個花心大蘿蔔...$a"/pause 500/speak Emily "那...那天晚上在帳篷裡...黑暗中你在我耳邊輕聲說了那麼多甜言蜜語…$s#$b#原來一切都是謊言，現在知道真相的我該如何面對每一天。$s"/pause 500/playMusic ragtime/speak Haley "好了，我們女人要團結起來！我們不能忍受這種事情！$a^我們不會再忍受你的傷害了！$a"/textAboveHead Leah "沒錯！"/pause 500/speak Abigail "嗯？你還有什麼要為自己辯解的？$a"/pause 1000/question fork1 "#對不起...我以前做錯了。#女士們，冷靜一下！我可以解釋..."/fork choseToExplain/pause 500/textAboveHead Maru "哼..."/pause 500/speak Abigail "說得好聽，但這事不能就這麼算了…$u"/pause 1000/playMusic none/speak Haley "...我們已經決定了...對嗎，女孩們？$u"/pause 500/speak Penny "...是的。$s"/speak Leah "當然。$a"/pause 1000/jump Haley/jump Abigail/jump Emily/jump Leah/jump Maru/jump Penny/pause 1000/speak Maru "我們都要疏遠你！$a"/faceDirection farmer 2 true/animate farmer false true 100 94/jump farmer/playSound slimedead/pause 2000/fade/viewport -2000 -2000/dump girls 3/end warpOut
Entries.choseToExplain: pause 100/textAboveHead Haley "我深表懷疑..."/pause 500/resetVariable/question fork2 "#我認為我們只是朋友！我不知道事情這麼嚴重！#皮埃爾向我施壓！他想賣出更多花束！#女士們，這再正常不過了！這只是生活方式的選擇..."/pause 100/fork lifestyleChoice/textAboveHead Haley "騙子！"/textAboveHead Maru "對，沒錯！"/speak Emily "你真以為我們會相信嗎？你給自己挖了一個更大的坑...$a"/pause 1000/faceDirection Haley 2/playMusic none/speak Haley "...我想我們已經決定了...對嗎，女孩們？$u"/pause 500/speak Penny "…是的。$s"/speak Leah "當然。$a"/faceDirection Haley 3/pause 1000/jump Haley/jump Abigail/jump Emily/jump Leah/jump Maru/jump Penny/pause 1000/jump Haley/jump Abigail/jump Emily/jump Leah/jump Maru/jump Penny/pause 1000/jump Haley/jump Abigail/jump Emily/jump Leah/jump Maru/jump Penny/pause 1000/speak Maru "我們都要疏遠你！$a"/faceDirection farmer 2 true/animate farmer false true 100 94/jump farmer/playSound slimedead/pause 2000/fade/viewport -2000 -2000/dump girls 4/end warpOut
Entries.lifestyleChoice: pause 100/speak Penny "哼！我不知道在祖祖城什麼是「正常」，但我絕對不會接受！$a"/speak Maru "如果我們根本不知道的話，那這就不是「選擇」！$a"/pause 100/speak Abigail "你別想這樣矇混過關，@.$a"/pause 1000/faceDirection Haley 2/playMusic none/speak Haley "...我想我們已經決定了...對嗎，女孩們？$u"/pause 500/speak Penny "…是的。$s"/speak Leah "當然。$a"/faceDirection Haley 3/pause 1000/jump Haley/jump Abigail/jump Emily/jump Leah/jump Maru/jump Penny/pause 1000/jump Haley/jump Abigail/jump Emily/jump Leah/jump Maru/jump Penny/pause 1000/jump Haley/jump Abigail/jump Emily/jump Leah/jump Maru/jump Penny/pause 1000/speak Maru "我們都要疏遠你！$a"/faceDirection farmer 2 true/animate farmer false true 100 94/jump farmer/playSound slimedead/pause 2000/fade/viewport -2000 -2000/dump girls 4/end warpOut
Entries.150938/n emilyStones: SunRoom/-1000 -1000/farmer -100 -100 0 Emily 15 18 2 Haley 12 18 2 Abigail 14 20 2 Caroline 13 20 2 Marnie 16 20 2/skippable/positionOffset Haley 0 32/showFrame Emily 54/showFrame Marnie 35/showFrame Haley 34/hideShadow Haley true/showFrame Abigail 53/showFrame Caroline 24/addObject 14 21 66 1/addObject 16 21 70/addObject 12 19 68 1/addObject 15 19 64 1/addObject 13 21 60 1/viewport 14 19 true/pause 4000/speak Emily "好的……大家都拿到石頭了。#$b#來，閉上雙眼，然後慢慢地深呼吸。集中注意力到你的胸腔。"/pause 3000/speak Emily "想像有純淨的能量隨著呼吸流進身體中。#$b#呼氣的時候，感受到壓力和負能量流動出去，每次呼吸都變得更加輕鬆。"/pause 3000/speak Emily "然後，用心去呼應石頭的振動頻率。感受到什麼了？"/pause 1000/textAboveHead Abigail "沒有。"/pause 2000/textAboveHead Marnie "我有！"/pause 2000/textAboveHead Caroline "很輕鬆"/pause 4000/emote Haley 24/pause 1000/emote Haley 24 true/viewport move 1 -1 7000/pause 4000/fade/viewport -1000 -1000/message "看來寶石有很不錯的效果……"/end

Entries.normal: pause 400/speak Harvey "抱歉，我邋邋遢遢的……我不知道你要過來。$h"/move farmer 0 -2 0/pause 600/speak Harvey "嘿，我好像聽見頭上有飛機聲……"/move Harvey 0 1 3/move Harvey -3 0 0/move Harvey 0 -2 0/speak Harvey "@，快過來！"/move farmer 0 -1 3/move farmer -4 0 0/move farmer 0 -2 0/speak Harvey "快看！"/globalFade/cutscene plane/viewport -1000 -1000/speak Harvey "小時候，我的夢想就是當飛行員。"/pause 1000/speak Harvey "但因為我視力不好，而且極度懼高，這個夢想已經漸漸暗淡了。$s"/faceDirection Harvey 3/faceDirection farmer 1/viewport 5 6 true/pause 1000/emote farmer 28/speak Harvey "沒事的……不用傷心。#$b#我長大了，能接受自己人生的定位了。不是所有人都能實現夢想的……世界就是這樣的。"/pause 1600/speak Harvey "嘿，你來看看我的飛機模型。我剛剛完成新的TR-星鳥豪華版。$h"/advancedMove Harvey false 0 2 4 0/faceDirection farmer 2/end

Entries.7/f Maru 1000/p Maru: Hospital_Ambient/-1000 -1000/farmer -10000 -10000 0 Maru 9 15 3 Harvey 7 10 0/skippable/changeSprite Maru Hospital/changePortrait Maru Hospital/showFrame Maru 18/viewport 10 15/pause 4000/speak Maru "*嘆息*…我對於準備這些樣本很不在行…$s"/pause 2000/playSound doorClose/warp farmer 10 19/pause 100/playSound throw/showFrame Maru 17/shake Maru 2000/jump Maru/specificTemporarySprite maruBeaker/move farmer 0 -1 0/pause 1250/showFrame Maru 0/faceDirection Maru 2/pause 100/speak Maru "啊！糟糕！$4"/pause 600/showFrame Maru 16/pause 1000/speak Maru "整份樣本都被毀了……哈維會把我殺了……$s"/pause 600/showFrame Maru 0/faceDirection Maru 0/pause 1500/faceDirection Maru 2/pause 400/speak Maru "$q 38 null#@我應該怎麼辦？#$r 38 -50 Event_Hospital_1#從地板上鏟起來就好。他不會發現的。#$r 39 -20 Event_Hospital_2#告訴哈維是我的錯。#$r 38 50 Event_Hospital_3#告訴哈維，這純屬意外。"/move Harvey 3 0 2/move Harvey 0 2 2/doAction 10 13/move Harvey 0 1 2/faceDirection Maru 1/speak Harvey "發生了什麼事？我聽到東西打碎的聲音。"/pause 500/speak Maru "$p 38#我不小心摔碎了一份樣本……真是對不起。$s|@進來後猛地一關門，嚇得我打碎了一份樣本。$u"/fork toldTruth/move Harvey 0 2 3/emote Harvey 40/speak Harvey "瑪魯，你不能把自己的問題推卸到別人身上。$a"/pause 300/faceDirection Harvey 1/speak Harvey "*唉*……我只好讓病人再來採集一次樣本了。$s#$b#這很可能會害得我們又虧損一個月……$s"/pause 600/faceDirection Maru 2/pause 1000/showFrame Maru 16/pause 500/emote farmer 28/end
Entries.toldTruth: move Harvey 0 2 3/speak Harvey "瑪魯，謝謝你告訴我事實真相。#$b#不用擔心樣本的事情，我們會再採集一份。"/pause 500/emote Harvey 32/pause 500/speak Maru "謝謝你對我的包容，哈維醫生。"/pause 500/speak Harvey "當然……你在這裡幫了我不少忙。沒有你，我都不知道該怎麼辦！"/pause 500/emote Maru 32/pause 1000/faceDirection Harvey 2/pause 500/emote Harvey 8/speak Harvey "@？你的臉色有些蒼白……你還好嗎？"/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 2/emote farmer 28/end

Entries.18/f George 1500/p George: sadpiano/17 17/farmer 10 19 1 George 18 17 0/skippable/emote George 12/speak George "不行……搆不到！$u#$b#要是我能從這該死的椅子上站起來……$s"/move farmer 4 0 0/move farmer 0 -2 0/move farmer 3 0 0/pause 500/showFrame 15/pause 500/pause 500/playSound Ship/pause 500/stopAnimation farmer/faceDirection farmer 1/faceDirection George 3/showFrame 35/pause 500/playSound coin/pause 300/stopAnimation farmer/pause 500/speak George "謝謝你，年輕人。^謝謝"/pause 800/speed George 1/faceDirection George 2/pause 500/move George 0 1 2/faceDirection farmer 2/pause 1000/speak George "孩子，那是30年前。$s#$b#我當時在煤礦裡上班。我們馬上就要換班了，但還剩最後一個礦需要炸開。#$b#我拿著一支炸藥，要去引爆，但我絆了一下。炸藥掉在地上，爆炸了。"/pause 800/speak George "等我再醒過來的時候，就已經躺在醫院裡了……然後他們告訴我，我再也不能走路了。"/faceDirection George 3/speak George "你明白了吧。你本來以為我是因為太老所以不能走路的吧#$b#如果不是那場意外，現在我的腿腳肯定比年輕還靈活！"/faceDirection George 2/speak George "……"/move farmer 0 1 1/pause 1700/speak George "你對我很好，年輕人。非常感謝。^你對我真的不錯，孩子。我很感激。#$b#等你老了，就會開始忘記，所有人都在關心你。"/pause 800/faceDirection George 3/pause 1000/end
Entries.19/f Evelyn 1000/p Evelyn: jaunty/3 17/farmer 8 19 3 Evelyn 3 17 0/skippable/move farmer -5 0 0/move farmer 0 -1 0/emote farmer 8/faceDirection Evelyn 2/speak Evelyn "噢！ @!你是不是在想這陣香味兒是從哪裡飄來的啊？#$b#哈哈，你真會說話！我其實正在烤我的招牌餅乾！$h"/emote farmer 16/speak Evelyn "給，嚐嚐味道怎麼樣？"/faceDirection Evelyn 0/pause 600/playSound clank/pause 600/faceDirection Evelyn 2/pause 900/farmerEat 223/pause 2000/stopAnimation farmer/faceDirection farmer 0/speak Evelyn "$q 51 null#您覺得如何？#$r 51 100 Event_cookies1#很美味！#$r 51 -100 Event_cookies2#就像在嚼冰球"/playMusic none/speak Evelyn "既然我們已經這麼熟了，就把我的配方給你吧。但是你要保守秘密。$h"/playSound reward/message "已學會製作「餅乾」"/addCookingRecipe Cookies/end
Entries.21/f Alex 1250/p Alex: sadpiano/12 5/farmer 10 11 0 Alex 13 5 0/skippable/pause 500/speak Alex "*唉*$s"/doAction 10 9/move farmer 0 -5 1/move farmer 3 0 0/pause 500/faceDirection Alex 2/pause 600/speak Alex "哦，嗨， @。$s"/faceDirection Alex 0/move farmer 1 0 0/move farmer 0 -1 3/emote farmer 8/pause 500/emote Alex 28/speak Alex "瞧瞧這些書啊。我一本都沒讀過。光是想到要把書翻開，就讓我緊張得不行。$s#$b#但在這個世上，沒有文化，就過不上好日子……$s"/faceDirection Alex 1/speak Alex "$q 57 null#我真沒用……$s#$r 57 0 Event_books1#才不是。你明明是個天才！#$r 57 50 Event_books2#我們都有自己的長處和短處。#$r 57 -50 Event_books3#沒用？對，總結得很精闢。"/faceDirection Alex 0/pause 1000/emote Alex 16/speak Alex "好吧，我不會放棄！$a"/faceDirection Alex 1/speak Alex "有志者事竟成！"/jump farmer/pause 800/speak Alex "嘿，說不定我們很快就能一邊吃飯一邊討論……則、哲、哲學。你們聰明人經常談論的就是這個吧？$h"/faceDirection farmer 2/animate farmer false true 100 102 103/pause 2000/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/stopAnimation farmer/end
Entries.2119820/f Alex 1500/p Alex: jaunty/-1000 -1000/farmer 10 10 0 Alex 13 6 2/skippable/showFrame Alex 28/animate Alex false true 100 28 29 30 31 32 32 31 30 29 28/viewport 13 6 true/pause 6500/stopAnimation Alex/pause 1000/doAction 10 9/move farmer 0 -3 1/move farmer 2 0 0/showFrame Alex 34 true/animate Alex false false 100 28 33 34/pause 600/speak Alex "噢！嘿……我正在進行日常體能鍛鍊。$6#$b#……抱歉，我沒有穿襯衫。$6"/pause 1000/emote Alex 40/speak Alex "@？我正想和你說件事呢……$8"/emote farmer 8/pause 1000/speak Alex "我已經開始意識到……那個，我以前對你太粗魯了。就是關於去職業隊的事情。$8"/pause 1000/showFrame Alex 33/pause 1000/speak Alex "我想我其實不是做專業運動員的料……或許那只是我幼稚的幻想……你說呢？$8#$b#話說……我想為我的誇誇其談和喋喋不休，向你道歉。謝謝你不生我的氣，還把我當作朋友。$6"/move farmer 1 0 0/pause 1000/jump farmer/pause 800/showFrame Alex 34/pause 800/emote Alex 32/pause 1200/showFrame Alex 29/pause 100/showFrame Alex 28/pause 100/showFrame Alex 29/pause 100/animate Alex false true 50 30 31 32 32 31 30/pause 3000/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end
Entries.56/f Harvey 500/p George: jaunty/16 18/farmer 9 24 0 George 16 18 1 Harvey 15 18 1/skippable/move farmer 0 -4 1/move farmer 1 0 1/speak Harvey "好，喬治。我要你深吸一口氣。"/pause 700/speak Harvey "嗯……請轉過身來。"/pause 300/faceDirection George 2/faceDirection George 3/speak Harvey "喬治，我跟你說實話吧。你如果想健康長壽的話，就得改改你的生活方式。#$b#你得減少食鹽的攝取量，並且適量鍛鍊一下你的手臂。"/emote George 12/speak George "嗯……我知道怎麼做最好。你以為你是誰啊，敢對我的生活指手畫腳？"/pause 500/speak Harvey "你問我是誰……我是你的醫生，喬治。#$b#而我學了8年醫，就是為了幫人們保持健康。"/move farmer 0 -1 1/move farmer 5 0 0/faceDirection Harvey 2 true/faceDirection George 2/speak Harvey "噢！#$b#對不起，你不能待在這裡……檢查時閒人勿進。"/faceDirection farmer 3/speak George "別著急！我還要再聽聽這個年輕人的意見。^別著急！我還要再聽聽這位年輕女士的意見。"/faceDirection farmer 1/speak Harvey "那好……"/speak Harvey "$q 84 null#@你覺得喬治該怎麼做？#$r 84 40 event_george1#喬治應該聽從哈維醫生的建議。#$r 85 -40 event_george2#喬治知道怎麼做對他的身體最好。"/faceDirection Harvey 1/faceDirection George 2/emote George 28/speak George "好。我就照你說的做，醫生。"/pause 500/faceDirection Harvey 2/speak Harvey "$p 84#謝謝你的幫助， @。我很感激。$h|你最好不要誤導我的病人， @。請你以後記住這一點。"/end

Entries.50/f Leah 500/p Leah: breezy/9 8/farmer -50 -50 0 Leah 3 7 3/skippable/animate Leah false true 100 16 17 18 19 19 19 19 16/pause 100/playSound woodyStep/pause 800/playSound woodyStep/pause 800/playSound woodyStep/pause 800/warp farmer 7 9/playSound woodyStep/playSound doorClose/pause 300/stopAnimation Leah/pause 300/faceDirection Leah 1 true/emote Leah 16/speak Leah "啊，你好，@！快進來，快進來。"/move farmer 0 -2 3/faceDirection Leah 1/move farmer -2 0 3/pause 500/speak Leah "我正在加工這座雕像。"/pause 300/speak Leah "過來看看吧。"/pause 300/move farmer -1 0 3/move farmer 0 -1 0 3/move farmer -1 0 2/faceDirection Leah 3/pause 500/animate Leah false true 100 16 17 18 19 19 19 19 16/pause 100/playSound woodyStep/pause 800/playSound woodyStep/pause 800/playSound woodyStep/pause 800/playSound woodyStep/pause 600/stopAnimation Leah/showFrame Leah 19/speak Leah "看到了嗎？我正在揭示木頭的本質。"/pause 500/showFrame Leah 12/faceDirection Leah 0/speak Leah "$q -1 null#等剝去了外層之後，真實的本性才開始展現……#$r -1 0 event_sculpt1#人也是這樣。#$r -1 0 event_sculpt2#我其實更喜歡未經雕琢的木頭。#$r -1 -100 event_sculpt3#(唐突)你能親我一下嗎？"/fork creepySexualPass/faceDirection Leah 3/pause 1500/faceDirection Leah 3/speak Leah "我第一次和父母來這座山谷度假的時候，還是個小姑娘。#$b#我知道，總有一天我會回來……這個地方充滿了藝術氣息！"/faceDirection Leah 3/pause 500/emote Leah 28/speak Leah "但我得承認……作為藝術家，想要養活自己可不容易。$s"/pause 1000/emote farmer 16/faceDirection Leah 0/question fork1 "#你為什麼不在鎮上舉辦一個藝術展呢？#你為什麼不把你的作品放在網路上出售啊？"/fork internet/faceDirection Leah 0/speak Leah "嗯……有意思。我想這可能會幫助鵜鶘鎮變成真正的藝術之鄉……$7"/faceDirection Leah 3/pause 700/speak Leah "但如果沒人喜歡我的雕像呢?那我就完了。$s"/pause 500/speak Leah "這我得考慮一下。$s"/faceDirection Leah 0/speak Leah "好吧，感謝你的拜訪， @。"/pause 600/move farmer 4 0 2 true/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/addMailReceived LeahArtShowSuggestion/end dialogueWarpOut Leah "為全村舉辦一次藝術展？這真是個大膽的主意， @。"
Entries.internet: speak Leah "嗯……我想這是個辦法……但我得先搞台電腦。$7"/addMailReceived LeahInternet/faceDirection Leah 3/emote Leah 28/pause 500/speak Leah "但……那可不便宜啊。$s"/pause 1000/speak Leah "好吧，感謝你的拜訪……"/pause 600/move farmer 4 0 2 true/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end warpOut
Entries.creepySexualPass: stopMusic/faceDirection farmer 2/speed Leah 4/move Leah 1 0 0/speed Leah 4/move Leah 0 -1 3/animate Leah false false 100 16 17 18 19/pause 100/playSound ow/playSound clubhit/animate farmer false false 1200 94/positionOffset farmer -8 0/pause 50/positionOffset farmer 8 0/pause 800/stopAnimation farmer/pause 100/end dialogueWarpOut Leah "……$a"
Entries.51/f Leah 1000/p Leah: sadpiano/-1000 -1000/farmer 7 9 0 Leah 13 8 0/skippable/showFrame Leah 20/changeMapTile Front 14 7 1453/viewport 12 8/move farmer 0 -1 1/speak Leah "凱爾……還要我跟你說多少次？我不想回城裡去！$8#$b#別再給我打電話了……我再也不想聽到你的聲音了！*掛斷*$8"/playSound openBox/faceDirection Leah 1/changeMapTile Front 14 7 1454/emote Leah 12/pause 1000/move farmer 4 0 1/faceDirection Leah 3/speak Leah "@……$6"/pause 300/emote Leah 28/speak Leah "我猜你聽到我對著電話大吼大叫了？$s"/faceDirection Leah 2/move farmer 1 0 1/pause 1000/playMusic desolate/speak Leah "那是我的前……$s"/faceDirection Leah 3/emote farmer 16/pause 600/speak Leah "我最好還是稍微和你解釋一下吧……$u"/pause 500/faceDirection Leah 2/pause 500/speak Leah "我們一起在城裡租了一間公寓。$u#$b#我白天要打零工，晚上則要通宵製作藝術品……我們的收入只夠勉強度日。$u#$b#他一直在嘮叨我，要我回學校，去學習商業或是醫學……那都是賺錢的職業。$a^她一直在嘮叨我，要我回學校，去學習商業或是醫學……那都是賺錢的職業。$a#$b#我覺得那是一般人的活法。你知道的……就是在郊區買房、生孩子、開家長會……之類的事情。$u"/faceDirection Leah 3/speak Leah "我還沒有過那種生活的打算， @……我非離開不可。所以我才會來這裡，追尋成為藝術家的夢想。"/pause 900/faceDirection Leah 2/speak Leah "$q 83 null#我是不是太自私了 @?$s#$r 83 0 event_parents1#不，你只是做了必須做的事情。#$r 83 0 event_parents2#不，是你的前任太蠢了。#$r 83 -20 event_parents3#不，但你其實應該待在城裡。#$r 83 -20 event_parents4#對，有那麼一點。#$r 83 -20 event_parents5#對，但人不為己天誅地滅。"/faceDirection Leah 3/fork angry/pause 200/fork LeahInternet internet2/fork LeahArtShowSuggestion artShowSuggest/speak Leah "好吧，感謝你能聽我說完。有朋友的感覺真好。"/pause 1500/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end dialogueWarpOut Leah "嘿，謝謝你之前那麼耐心地傾聽我。"
Entries.584059/f Leah 2000/p Leah/n LeahInternet: breezy/-1000 -1000/farmer 7 9 0 Leah 12 10 2/skippable/specificTemporarySprite leahLaptop/showFrame Leah 28/positionOffset Leah 0 12/viewport 11 9/move farmer 0 -1 1/move farmer 4 0 2/showFrame Leah 29/speak Leah "嘿！看這個。"/pause 500/showFrame Leah 28/move farmer 0 2 2/pause 400/speak Leah "我買了一台筆記型電腦，在網路上開了個藝術品商店……就像你建議的那樣。"/pause 800/playSound Pickup_Coin15/showFrame Leah 29/pause 400/speak Leah "你聽到了嗎？這代表剛剛有人買了件東西！$h"/showFrame Leah 28/emote Leah 40/speak Leah "嗯……嗯……就是這個「K先生」一直在買我的雕像。$7#$b#我想他一定是個有錢人，剛好又很喜歡我的作品。"/pause 500/playSound Pickup_Coin15/pause 300/emote Leah 16/speak Leah "哇！自從那促銷之後，現在我暫時不用擔心我的電費單了……$6"/pause 800/showFrame Leah 29/speak Leah "話說……感謝你給我出的這個主意， @。目前來看，這確實是個大成功！這樣我就有錢去進行全職的藝術創作了。$h"/showFrame Leah 28/speak Leah "對不起，我要失陪一下……我得先整整這些CSS表單……$7"/pause 500/playSound Pickup_Coin15/pause 1000/playSound Pickup_Coin15/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end warpOut
Entries.angry: emote Leah 12/faceDirection Leah 1/speak Leah "……抱歉。我不該發火。$s"/emote Leah 40/speak Leah "或許你是對的……如果我留在那裡，生活應該容易得多。$u#$b#也許還是現實一點的好……在我看來，我的藝術生涯永遠不會成功，最後我只能在悲慘的境遇中結束自己的一生。$s"/pause 500/faceDirection Leah 3/pause 500/speak Leah "好吧，感謝你能聽我說完。有朋友的感覺真好。"/pause 1500/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end warpOut
Entries.internet2: pause 50/speak Leah "我一直在存錢買電腦……然後我就能按照你的建議，在網路上出售我的作品。"/emote farmer 32/speak Leah "有朋友關心，真是太好了！"/pause 1500/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end warpOut
Entries.artShowSuggest: pause 50/speak Leah "話說……我一直在考慮你說的那個開藝術展的事情。#$b#我製作了幾尊新雕像，想在藝術展上展出……我很緊張，但想到能展示自己的作品也好興奮。#$b#很高興你願意和我一起從星露谷開始，@！$h"/pause 500/end warpOut

Entries.linusWell: pause 100/friendship Linus 250/move Linus 0 1 3/move Linus -2 0 0/faceDirection farmer 2/faceDirection Robin 2/playMusic spring_day_ambient/speak Linus "謝謝，@。你讓我擔心了，...我以為你會邀請我和你一起搬去農場！*眨眼*#$b#你知道，我將你視作星露谷中最親密的朋友...你從來沒有試圖「修正」我...你尊重我的生活方式，即使你無法理解。$h#$b#我真的很感激。"/move Linus -2 0 3/faceDirection farmer 3/faceDirection Robin 3/emote farmer 32/speak Linus "啊...你能聞到嗎？這是成熟漿果的甜香味...$h"/jump Linus/speed Linus 4/move Linus -4 0 3/move Linus 0 -10 0 true/fade/viewport -2000 -2000/pause 500/speak Robin "噢..多麼甜心...$h"/pause 1000/end
Entries.5183338/e 3917666/O Maru/w sunny/t 2200: nightTime/-1000 -1000/farmer 23 29 3 Maru 14 29 3/skippable/changeToTemporaryMap NightSceneMaruMap2 false/bgColor 0 0 0/ambientLight 0 0 0/viewport 14 25 true clamp/pause 1000/move farmer -8 0 3/faceDirection Maru 1/pause 800/showFrame Maru 32/pause 700/showFrame Maru 4/speak Maru "嘿，@。你來得正好……彗星就要出現了。"/pause 500/faceDirection Maru 2/pause 1000/faceDirection farmer 2/pause 1000/speak Maru "這夜空真美麗，是不是？"/pause 2000/faceDirection Maru 1/faceDirection farmer 3/pause 1000/speak Maru "還記得我們第一次來觀星嗎？已經是挺久以前了……"/faceDirection Maru 2/speak Maru "那天晚上我差點就把真正的心意說出來了……但我擔心你會拒絕我。"/faceDirection Maru 1/speak Maru "誰知道之後我們這麼快就結婚了！$h"/pause 500/emote farmer 20/pause 500/jump Maru/pause 400/speak Maru "哦！要來了……"/faceDirection Maru 3/faceDirection farmer 3 true/showFrame Maru 28/emote Maru 40/pause 1000/textAboveHead Maru "哇哦！"/pause 3000/showFrame Maru 12/move Maru 0 1 0/speak Maru "快看！"/pause 500/move farmer -1 0 3/pause 1000/animate farmer true true 100 35/pause 1000/fade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 1000/playMusic spaceMusic/warp Maru 15 29/faceDirection Maru 3/cutscene marucomet/pause 1000/viewport 14 25 true clamp/pause 3000/stopAnimation farmer/pause 1000/faceDirection farmer 1/pause 500/speak Maru "看到彗星之後，按照慣例該許個願……"/pause 500/quickQuestion 你會許什麼願？#生一個新的寶寶#我們能一同變老#掙更多的錢(break)jump Maru\pause 500\speak Maru "哦！我們當然可以去努力一下……$l"\emote Maru 20(break)emote Maru 20\speak Maru "那真是太棒了！$l#$b#我的願望也是這個。$l"(break)speak Maru "錢？好吧……$s#$b$我覺得這很實際……$8"\emote Maru 28\speak Maru "我的願望會更浪漫一點……"/pause 2000/animate Maru false true 100 28/animate farmer false true 100 101/positionOffset farmer 16 0/specificTemporarySprite heart 15 29/pause 2000/specificTemporarySprite maruTelescope/viewport move 0 -1 13000/pause 16000/fade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 3000/end newDay
Entries.9333219/O Sebastian/f Sebastian 3500/w r: rain/48 36/farmer 49 31 2 Sebastian 50 36 3/makeInvisible 44 31 5 5/addConversationTopic sebastianFrog 0/skippable/move farmer 0 4 2/faceDirection Sebastian 0/speak Sebastian "嘿，@……很高興你來了。"/emote farmer 8/faceDirection Sebastian 3/speak Sebastian "有一隻受傷的青蛙在灌木叢中……我要去救他！"/emote farmer 28/faceDirection Sebastian 0/speak Sebastian "我需要你的幫助。去那邊的灌木叢裡試試讓他朝我這個方向過來。我會在這裡等著抓住他。"/pause 500/faceDirection Sebastian 3/move farmer -5 0 2/pause 500/showFrame Sebastian 54/playSound grassyStep/pause 500/speak Sebastian "好……你準備好了嗎？"/emote farmer 56/textAboveHead Sebastian "就是現在！"/pause 500/doAction 44 36/pause 1000/doAction 44 36/pause 1000/doAction 44 36/playSound croak/specificTemporarySprite sebastianFrog/pause 10000/playSound coin/showFrame Sebastian 55/jump Sebastian/textAboveHead Sebastian "抓住他了！"/move farmer 5 0 2/move farmer 0 1 1/speak Sebastian "可憐的小傢伙……他的腿都傷成這樣了。$s"/emote farmer 28/quickQuestion #我們應該怎麼做？#我要收養他……#我不認為他會成功自癒#讓我們護理他，幫助他恢復健康！(break)speak Sebastian "我現在要把他帶回家，讓他感覺更舒適些。#$b#我想應該去了解一下關於如何照顧青蛙。也許瑪妮知道一些。"(break)speak Sebastian "哈……好的，我覺得可以。$h#$b#他一定深受你喜愛……$7"\faceDirection farmer 2 true\jump farmer\showFrame farmer 94\startJittering(break)emote Sebastian 12\speak Sebastian "好吧，如果你不同意的話我很抱歉……但我想給這個可憐的小傢伙一個機會。"(break)speak Sebastian "我們一定會竭盡所能，但小心現在別一直黏著他……"/pause 300/stopJittering/stopAnimation farmer/faceDirection farmer 1/pause 500/speak Sebastian "我們帶他回家吧。"/pause 500/playSound croak/pause 2000/end

Entries.10040609: clubloop/7 4/farmer 7 8 0 MrQi 7 4 0/skippable/move farmer 0 -2 0/pause 3000/speak MrQi "哦喲喲……看看是誰找到了我的隱藏核桃房間。"/pause 1000/faceDirection MrQi 1 true/pause 100/faceDirection MrQi 2/pause 1000/speak MrQi "實在了不起。#$b#儘管你只需要一小部分核桃就可以在島上自由地通行，但是你還是更進了一步。#$b#你進入這扇隱藏門的渴望極為強烈，所以付出超過常人的努力到達了這裡。#$b#這份熱忱讓你出類拔萃，孩子。你擁有特別的能量。"/pause 1000/faceDirection MrQi 3 true/pause 100/faceDirection MrQi 0/pause 500/speak MrQi "話雖如此……#$b#你不會以為挑戰就到此為止了吧？#$b#並沒有……哈、哈、哈……事實上，挑戰才剛剛開始。"/faceDirection MrQi 3 true/pause 40/faceDirection MrQi 2/pause 1000/faceDirection MrQi 3/speak MrQi "在你的左手邊有一塊看板，上面有一些很有趣的機遇。#$b#這些挑戰是我專門為你設計的，它們會讓你挑戰極限。"/faceDirection MrQi 2/speak MrQi "不過，如果能攻克我的挑戰，你會獲得一種獨特的貨幣……我稱之為「齊鑽」。"/pause 400/speak MrQi "記得別把它們放到嘴裡，孩子……它們放射性很強。呵、呵、呵……"/emote farmer 28/pause 500/faceDirection MrQi 1/speak MrQi "你可以在右手邊的機器上用齊鑽兌換一些罕見而且強大的獎勵。"/pause 1000/faceDirection MrQi 2/speak MrQi "聽起來是不是很有趣？#$b#是啊……我覺得像你這樣的人會覺得很有意思，很有意思……"/pause 400/faceDirection MrQi 1 true/pause 50/faceDirection MrQi 0/pause 500/speak MrQi "好了，我還有更重要的事情要做……告辭。"/pause 2000/end

Entries.529952/C: WizardSong/54 36/Wizard 54 36 0 farmer 50 40 1/addQuest 28/skippable/move farmer 1 0 0/move farmer 0 -4 1/faceDirection Wizard 3 true/move farmer 1 0 1/pause 800/faceDirection Wizard 0/pause 600/emote Wizard 40/pause 500/speak Wizard "呃…@。我在等你。"/pause 800/faceDirection Wizard 3/pause 400/faceDirection Wizard 0/pause 400/speak Wizard "我有告訴過你我過去曾結過婚嗎？"/pause 800/faceDirection Wizard 3 true/pause 50/faceDirection Wizard 2/pause 800/showFrame Wizard 18/pause 800/speak Wizard "作為一個像我這樣的男人，我知道這很奇怪…但這是事實。"/pause 500/showFrame Wizard 0/pause 800/faceDirection Wizard 3/speak Wizard "我和我前妻一起生活了很多年，直…直到我犯了一個錯誤導致她離開了。"/pause 400/faceDirection Wizard 0/speak Wizard "她的憤怒和嫉妒是如此強烈，以至於她全身變成綠色，開始在鄉村周圍飛行，詛咒著她在路上遭遇的一切……"/pause 1000/speak Wizard "當我發現時，我把這條通道封鎖到她的家裡…………擔心一個無辜的村民可能會被她的黑魔法所掠奪。"/move Wizard -1 0 3/speak Wizard "但現在，肯定被解封了…我們分開的時候，她拿走了我的魔法藥水！#$b#我需要拿回那藥水！$h#$b#我本是透過自己來完成的，但我…我再也不能看見她。所以我才需要你的幫忙。"/move Wizard 1 0 0/speak Wizard "為了解封這條通道，你需要一個黑暗護符。與下水道的科羅布斯交談，他應該知道在哪能得到。"/pause 500/faceDirection Wizard 3/speak Wizard "我全指望你了…如果你能取回我的魔法藥水我承諾我將會給你值得的東西…現在趕緊出發吧！"/pause 500/faceDirection Wizard 2/pause 500/showFrame Wizard 16/pause 500/playSound wand/warp Wizard -3000 -3000/specificTemporarySprite wizardWarp2/faceDirection farmer 2 true/showFrame farmer 94/pause 3000/showFrame farmer 0/specificTemporarySprite witchFlyby/pause 4000/end

Entries.40/f Elliott 1000/p Gus/t 1500 2200: playful/11 20/farmer 14 24 0 Elliott -30 -30 0 Clint 18 22 2 Marnie 9 22 3 Pam 7 18 1 Lewis 8 22 1 Pierre 4 22 2 Demetrius 3 23 1 Gus 14 18 2 Emily 16 18 3/skippable/move farmer 0 -3 3/faceDirection Pierre 1 true/move farmer -3 0 0/faceDirection Pierre 2 true/move farmer 0 -1 0/faceDirection Marnie 0 true/faceDirection Gus 3/speak Gus "嗨 .我馬上就來給您點單。"/faceDirection Gus 2/move Emily 2 0 1/faceDirection Marnie 3 true/pause 800/move Emily -2 0 0/pause 1000/faceDirection Clint 3 true/move Emily 2 0 1/warp Elliott 14 24/playSound doorClose/pause 500/move Elliott 0 -3 3/faceDirection farmer 2 true/move Elliott -2 0 0/move Elliott 0 -1 0/faceDirection farmer 1/faceDirection Elliott 3/speak Elliott "您好， @!真是巧啊！#$b#我剛寫了八個小時的書，想來這裡休息一下。$h"/pause 400/faceDirection Elliott 1/speak Elliott "酒保！請來兩杯最好的麥芽酒！^酒保！我要你們最好的麥芽酒。再給這位女士來杯葡萄酒！"/faceDirection Gus 3/faceDirection farmer 0/speak Gus "……$u"/move Gus 3 0 0/move Gus 0 -1 0/faceDirection Emily 2/playSound openBox/pause 400/playSound Milking/move Pam -6 0 0/move Gus 0 1 3/move Gus -5 0 2/faceDirection Elliott 0/pause 500/speak Gus "給您，先生。$u"/pause 500/faceDirection Elliott 3/faceDirection farmer 1/speak Elliott "$q 28376 null#等等。讓我們舉杯慶祝一下！為了……#$r 28376 25 event_toast4#鵜鶘鎮！#$r 28376 50 event_toast2#我們的友誼！#$r 28376 -10 event_toast1#我們的健康！#$r 28376 -50 event_toast3#你的命運！"/faceDirection Elliott 2/faceDirection farmer 2/pause 900/showFrame Elliott 16/animate Elliott false false 120 16 17 18 19 19 18 18 19 19 18 18 19 19 18 18 19 19 18 18 17 16/pause 500/farmerEat 346/pause 900/pause 1100/stopAnimation farmer/faceDirection farmer 1/speak Elliott "*打嗝*……勁好大啊……$h"/pause 800/animate Elliott false false 400 20 21 22 21 20 21 22 21 20 21 22 21 20 21 22 21 16/pause 1000/faceDirection farmer 1/pause 800/faceDirection farmer 2/animate farmer false true 100 102 103/pause 1000/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 600/stopAnimation farmer/end warpOut
Entries.96/f Gus 1000/f Pam 500/p Gus: jaunty/10 21/farmer -100 -100 0 Gus 10 21 2 Pam -101 -101 0/skippable/pause 200/emote Gus 28/pause 500/playSound doorClose/warp farmer 14 24/pause 500/faceDirection Gus 1 true/move farmer 0 -3 3/speak Gus "哦，哥們，你好。^您好, @。"/pause 500/faceDirection Gus 2/move farmer -3 0 2/pause 800/faceDirection farmer 3/pause 400/emote farmer 8/pause 700/speak Gus "*唉*……正在查看上個月的營收……情況不是很好， @。$s#$b#最麻煩的是……我不想說，因為她是我的朋友……但，都怪潘姆！她已經好幾個星期沒付帳了！$s#$b#……我知道她會辯解，但我不想傷害她的自尊心。$s"/pause 600/faceDirection Gus 1/speak Gus "@，你得幫幫我！$s"/stopMusic/pause 500/playSound doorClose/warp Pam 14 24/move Pam 0 -3 3/faceDirection Gus 1 true/faceDirection farmer 1/emote Gus 16/speak Pam "嘿！$h#$b#格斯……我快渴死了，給我拿點喝的。"/emote Gus 28/speak Gus "呃……好吧，潘姆。$s"/emote Gus 28/pause 700/emote Pam 8/pause 400/speak Pam "$q 207 null#@，你有什麼事嗎？#$r 207 -50 event_credit1#你現在就得把賒的帳給結了！#$r 208 15 event_credit2#酒吧在經濟上有些困難"/pause 400/faceDirection Pam 1/emote Pam 12/speak Pam "……$u#$b#*唉*……好吧，我覺得我最好還是把帳給結了。$s"/move Pam -2 0 0/move Pam 0 -1 3/move Pam -2 0 2/faceDirection Gus 0/faceDirection farmer 3/playSound money/pause 500/speak Gus "謝謝你，潘姆！$h"/pause 500/faceDirection Gus 1/speak Gus "還要謝謝你， @。$u"/pause 500/faceDirection Gus 0/speak Gus "潘姆，我現在就給你拿喝的。$h"/friendship Gus 50/end dialogue Gus "謝謝你的幫助， @。有了這些錢，酒吧就得救了。"

event_advice1#把女人當男人一樣對待"/speed Emily 4/move Emily -6 0 2/speed Emily 2/move Emily 0 4 2/doAction 4 16/playSound openBox/stopMusic/move Emily 0 3 1/move Emily 1 0 2/move Emily 0 1 3/pause 400/pause 700/speak Emily "嗨，克林特，今晚想來點什麼？$h"/pause 600/faceDirection Clint 1/pause 200/speak Clint "正確！"/pause 300/speak Clint "呃……我是說，請給我來個大份起司。再多澆一份醬汁。$s#$b#……$u"/faceDirection Clint 3/faceDirection Emily 2/pause 300/faceDirection Clint 2/speak Emily "嗨 @。"/pause 300/faceDirection farmer 0/faceDirection Clint 1/speak Clint "呃……*清嗓子*謝……謝謝，艾米麗。謝謝你……給我點單。#$b#那個，艾米麗？我……*吞口水*我在想……$h"/pause 300/faceDirection Emily 3/emote Emily 8/pause 400/speak Emily "克林特，怎麼了？$u"/pause 500/emote Clint 28/pause 1200/speak Clint "…… 算了，沒什麼。$s"/faceDirection Clint 0/playMusic sadpiano/pause 300/faceDirection Emily 2/pause 300/faceDirection Emily 3/pause 500/move Emily 0 -1 1/move Emily 1 0 1/faceDirection Shane 3/speak Emily "嗨，謝恩！這是你的飲料。$h"/pause 300/faceDirection Shane 1/pause 400/addObject 8 17 346 1/playSound Entries.911526/f Alex 2500/t 1900 2200/n joshMes: gusviolin/-1000 -1000/farmer 5 5 1 Gus 10 6 2 Alex 9 5 3 Emily 9 17 2/skippable/showFrame 117/showFrame Alex 39/positionOffset farmer 12 8/positionOffset Alex -12 0/animate Gus false true 723 16 17/viewport 7 4 true/pause 23000/stopAnimation Gus/pause 1000/faceDirection Gus 3/speak Alex "謝謝你，格斯。這太棒了。"/move Gus 0 1 1/move Gus 1 0 2/move Gus 0 1 2/doAction 11 9/move Gus 0 3 1/move Gus 12 0 3 true/speak Alex "這裡真不錯……我從沒在這裡吃過飯。"/pause 1000/emote Alex 40/speak Alex "嗯，總之……我預訂了這個包廂，是為了和你聊聊……$l"/warp Emily 11 11 true/playSound woodyStep/move Emily 0 -4 3/move Emily -4 0 0/move Emily 0 -1 0/speak Emily "我端來了@先生的扁麵條配奶油蘑菇醬。^這是女士點的蔬菜湯和胡桃沙拉。#$b#……還有亞歷克斯的烤牛排。^還有這位先生的烤牛排。"/playSound woodyHit/specificTemporarySprite joshDinner/speak Alex "謝謝。"/move Emily 4 0 2/move Emily 0 5 1/move Emily 11 0 1 true/speak Alex "那麼，我想說的就是……$9"/playMusic musicboxsong/speak Alex "*咽口水*$s"/pause 600/speak Alex "那個……第一次見到你的時候，我就被你吸引了。我有點不好開口……但我從沒對別人有過這種感覺。$l^第一次見到你的時候，我就覺得你好漂亮。$l#$b#我一直在告訴自己「你不能對別的男孩有這種感覺」。$l^一般情況下，就算我對某人動了心，那種感覺很快也會冷卻……$l"/pause 800/speak Alex "……但我的內心有不同的看法。^……但對你的感覺卻越來越強。$l"/pause 400/emote Alex 40/pause 600/question fork1 "#我再贊同不過了。#抱歉……我對你沒感覺。"/pause 400/fork rejectJosh/speak Alex "……$l#$b#我不敢相信，對彼此說出這番話，居然要花這麼長時間。$l"/emote Alex 32/pause 800/animate Alex false false 400 40 41 41 40 41 41 40 41 41 40 41 41 40/pause 800/playSound eat/pause 800/playSound eat/pause 800/playSound eat/pause 800/playSound gulp/pause 400/speak Alex "嗯……這塊牛排好棒。你能聞到香辣醬的味道嗎？$10"/eyes 1 -4000/animate Alex false false 400 40 41 41 40 41 41 40/pause 1000/specificTemporarySprite alexDiningDog/playSound dogWhining/pause 1000/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 6000/end dialogue Alex "……$l"
Entries.rejectJosh: pause 100/playMusic none/shake Alex 2000/emote Alex 28/speak Alex "……噢……$s#$b#如……如果讓你不舒服了的話真是抱歉……$s"/pause 2000/speak Alex "我已經不餓了……$s"/viewport move 1 1 5000/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 4000/end dialogue Alex "……$l"
Entries.195099/f Shane 2500/f Sebastian 2500/f S: playful/-1000 -1000/farmer 27 19 1 Sam 36 20 1 Sebastian 37 19 2 Harvey 39 19 2 Shane 40 17 2 Elliott 41 19 2 Alex 42 20 3/animate Shane false true 200 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 21 22 23 24 24 24 24 23 22 21 20 20 20 20/pause 1000/message "出於某些原因，你決定把手放到口袋裡..."/pause 500/message "你摸著兔子的腳，感覺如釋重負..."/move farmer 5 0 1 true/viewport 37 19 true/move false/pause 500/faceDirection Sam 3 true/faceDirection Elliott 3 true/faceDirection Harvey 3 true/faceDirection Alex 3 true/faceDirection Shane 3 true/faceDirection Sebastian 3 true/textAboveHead Sam "嘿！"/textAboveHead Alex "最近好嗎？"/textAboveHead Shane "哦，你好"/pause 2000/move farmer 3 0 1/emote farmer 32/pause 500/speak Harvey "你來得正是時候，剛好趕上鵜鶘鎮第一屆八球錦標賽！"/pause 500/speak Elliott "別擔心，我以前也沒玩過。$h"/pause 500/speak Shane "很簡單的，你只管猛擊母球就對了…$h"/pause 500/fade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 1500/message "你和男孩們玩了一局桌球。"/pause 1000/message "毫無懸念，塞巴斯蒂安贏了...不過還是很有趣！"/pause 500/end
Entries.195013/f Shane 2500/f Sebastian 2500/f S: playful/-1000 -1000/farmer 27 19 1 Sam 36 20 1 Sebastian 37 19 2 Harvey 39 19 2 Shane 40 17 2 Elliott 41 19 2 Alex 42 20 3/animate Shane false true 200 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 21 22 23 24 24 24 24 23 22 21 20 20 20 20/move farmer 5 0 1 true/viewport 37 19 true/move false/pause 500/startJittering/faceDirection farmer 2 true/animate farmer false true 100 94/jump farmer/pause 2000/stopAnimation farmer/showFrame farmer 0/stopJittering/playSound thudStep/faceDirection farmer 3 true/showFrame farmer 7 true/startJittering/faceDirection Sam 3 true/faceDirection Elliott 3 true/faceDirection Harvey 3 true/faceDirection Alex 3 true/faceDirection Shane 3 true/faceDirection Sebastian 3 true/textAboveHead Sam "別跑那麼快！"/textAboveHead Alex "別動！"/textAboveHead Shane "站住！"/pause 3000/stopJittering/showFrame farmer 6 true/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 1/move farmer 3 0 1/playMusic none/emote farmer 28/pause 500/speak Sam "呵，從沒想過你所有的「男朋友」會出現在一個房間裡吧，@?$a"/pause 500/speak Harvey "你騙取了我們所有人的愛…你真是太可怕了...$s^@...我還以為你想要和我結婚，共同組建家庭...我到底做錯了什麼？$s"/pause 500/speak Shane "我最後僅存的希望的碎片也徹底被毀了…可真得謝謝你啊，@。你現在高興了嗎？$s"/pause 500/speak Alex "@？我以為...我以為我們是「彼此的唯一」...你卻只是在利用我？$s^你盯著*我*看什麼？你以為我會來救你？$a"/pause 500/speak Elliott "唯獨這次，我竟無言以對...$a"/pause 500/playMusic wedding/speak Sam "我們不會再忍受你的傷害了！$a^現在，我們都知道真相了！我們不會容忍這種事情！$a"/textAboveHead Alex "沒錯！"/pause 500/speak Sebastian "嗯？你還有什麼要為自己辯解的？$a"/pause 1000/question fork1 "#對不起...我以前做錯了。#各位，冷靜一下！我可以解釋..."/fork choseToExplain/pause 500/textAboveHead Alex "當然..."/pause 500/speak Shane "說得好聽，但這事不能就這麼算了...$a"/pause 1000/playMusic none/speak Sam "...我們已經決定了...對嗎，伙伴們？$u"/pause 500/speak Harvey "…是的。$s"/speak Elliott "當然。$a"/pause 1000/jump Sam/jump Sebastian/jump Elliott/jump Shane/jump Alex/jump Harvey/pause 1000/speak Sam "我們都要疏遠你！$a"/faceDirection farmer 2 true/animate farmer false true 100 94/jump farmer/playSound slimedead/pause 2000/fade/viewport -2000 -2000/dump guys 3/end warpOut
Entries.choseToExplain: pause 100/textAboveHead Shane "我深表懷疑..."/pause 500/resetVariable/question fork2 "#你們所有人都在逼我！讓我說不出「不」！#皮埃爾向我施壓！他想賣出更多花束！#（開始哭）"/pause 100/fork crying/textAboveHead Sam "騙子！"/textAboveHead Alex "對，沒錯！"/speak Elliott "不要把自己的錯誤歸咎在別人身上！你只會繼續失去我們的尊重...$a"/pause 1000/faceDirection Sam 2/playMusic none/speak Sam "...我想我們已經決定了...對嗎，男孩們？$u"/pause 500/speak Harvey "…是的。$s"/speak Sebastian "當然。$a"/faceDirection Sam 3/pause 1000/jump Sam/jump Sebastian/jump Elliott/jump Shane/jump Alex/jump Harvey/pause 1000/jump Sam/jump Sebastian/jump Elliott/jump Shane/jump Alex/jump Harvey/pause 1000/jump Sam/jump Sebastian/jump Elliott/jump Shane/jump Alex/jump Harvey/pause 1000/speak Sam "我們都要疏遠你！$a"/faceDirection farmer 2 true/animate farmer false true 100 94/jump farmer/playSound slimedead/pause 2000/fade/viewport -2000 -2000/dump guys 4/end warpOut
Entries.crying: pause 100/faceDirection farmer 0/emote farmer 28/pause 1000/emote Harvey 12 true/emote Sebastian 12 true/emote Shane 12 true/emote Sam 12 true/emote Elliott 12 true/emote Alex 12 true/speak Harvey "沒用的！這次別想再騙取我們的同情了！$a"/speak Alex "在我看來你只是又演了一場戲...$a^一如既往...$a"/pause 100/speak Sebastian "你需要為自己做過的事負責...$a"/pause 1000/faceDirection Sam 2/playMusic none/speak Sam "...我想我們已經決定了...對嗎，男孩們？$u"/pause 500/speak Harvey "…是的。$s"/speak Sebastian "當然。$a"/faceDirection Sam 3/pause 1000/jump Sam/jump Sebastian/jump Elliott/jump Shane/jump Alex/jump Harvey/pause 1000/jump Sam/jump Sebastian/jump Elliott/jump Shane/jump Alex/jump Harvey/pause 1000/jump Sam/jump Sebastian/jump Elliott/jump Shane/jump Alex/jump Harvey/pause 1000/speak Sam "我們都要疏遠你！$a"/faceDirection farmer 2 true/animate farmer false true 100 94/jump farmer/playSound slimedead/pause 2000/fade/viewport -2000 -2000/dump guys 4/end warpOut
Entries.wewereworried: emote farmer 40/faceDirection Marnie 1/pause 1000/faceDirection Shane 2/emote Shane 12/speak Shane "我是你的丈夫……你應該相信我。我一直對你坦誠地告訴你我的問題。$a#$b#那個……我知道我還沒從強行戒酒癮中緩過來……但是，我在努力做到最好……而且我也健康多了。#$b#我的生活已經比以前好太多了。我已經不在陰暗的地方了……"/pause 500/emote Marnie 20 true/emote farmer 20 true/pause 1300/faceDirection Shane 0/speak Shane "說起來，我玩這個遊戲的時候，我會專注到沒心思想別的事情。當我有「衝動」的時候這確實很有幫助……"/faceDirection Shane 2/speak Shane "總之……我就……呃……再玩一局就回家。行嗎？"/pause 500/emote farmer 32/pause 1000/end dialogue Shane "你們剛才進來看到我在街機前面的時候，肯定很疑惑吧！$h"
Entries.3917590/n saloonSportsRoom/O Alex: distantBanjo/-100 -100/farmer 31 20 0 Alex 32 7 0 Shane 33 8 0 Gus 34 8 0 Kent 35 8 0 George 36 7 0/skippable/specificTemporarySprite gridballGameTV/viewport 34 7 true/move farmer 0 -13 1 true/pause 1000/textAboveHead Alex "做得好！"/pause 600/jump Gus/pause 2000/textAboveHead George "進球！"/pause 400/textAboveHead Alex "走起來！"/faceDirection Kent 3 true/faceDirection Gus 1 true/animate Gus false true 100 22/animate Kent false true 100 17/shake Gus 500/shake Kent 500/pause 500/textAboveHead George "好樣的！"/pause 1000/stopAnimation Gus/stopAnimation Kent/faceDirection Kent 0 true/faceDirection Gus 0/pause 1000/faceDirection Alex 3/pause 400/speak Alex "嘿，@！你做到了！$h"/faceDirection Alex 1/speak Alex "所以……你覺得呢？"/pause 500/emote farmer 8/faceDirection Alex 3/speak Alex "我一直在想……你知道我以前經常夢想有一天成為運動員嗎？#$b#唔，最終結果是跟我想的有些不一樣……$9#$b#不過別誤會了！我還是很開心的！$h#$b#……但是我覺得如果能有一個地方可以讓我們一起在外頭看週日的比賽會很酷。格斯非常喜歡這個主意，他把他房子的裡屋分出來一部分給我了！#$b#這樣，我就可以用簡單的辦法，讓我的「夢想」一直保持。"/pause 500/emote farmer 32/pause 600/faceDirection George 3/speak George "你做得很好，兒子。我本來是可以在家裡看的，但來這裡讓我感覺自己又年輕了！$h"/faceDirection Alex 1/speak Alex "謝謝，爺爺。"/pause 500/speak Kent "我很高興能有個藉口離開家，讓我能夠喘口氣。"/faceDirection Alex 2/pause 100/textAboveHead Shane "我也一樣"/pause 1200/speak Gus "我很開心。而且它對生意也有好處！$h#$b#雖然可能對謝恩的肝臟不太好……$s"/pause 100/faceDirection Shane 2 true/animate Shane false true 100 18/jump Shane/pause 500/textAboveHead Shane "嘿！"/pause 500/emote Alex 32/pause 2000/fade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 400/message "看來他們有了一個新的星期天常規活動。"/pause 1000/message "5,000 金花得很值！"/pause 1000/end dialogue Alex "再次感謝你的出資，@。對我來說這是一個有趣的項目，並且看起來大伙都很高興！"
Entries.3206194/n gusGiantOmelet: distantBanjo/-1000 -1000/farmer -100 -100 02 Gus 10 21 2 Willy 13 21 3 Lewis 8 22 1 Robin 9 20 2 Pam 11 20 2 Marnie 9 23 0/skippable/specificTemporarySprite staticSprite LooseSprites\\Cursors2 145 193 32 28 10 20.75 8 .15/viewport 11 21 true/pause 3000/speak Gus "唔，伙伴們……我們這次聚在一起又是因為一個很特殊的情況。"/pause 500/speak Gus "……一位好朋友難得到訪……"/pause 500/jump Gus/pause 400/speak Gus "……它就是我舉世聞名的巨型煎蛋卷！$h#$b#爽口的甜椒、多汁的番茄、口感豐富的蘑菇、香濃的起司……全部包裹在香軟的煎蛋裡。來吃吧，伙伴們。"/move Marnie 1 0 0/move Willy -1 0 3/move Lewis 1 0 1/showFrame Lewis 28/playSound coin/showFrame Willy 32/showFrame Robin 37/showFrame Pam 36/pause 600/shake Lewis 600/playSound eat/pause 600/shake Pam 600/playSound eat/pause 800/shake Robin 600/playSound eat/pause 600/shake Pam 400/playSound eat/pause 700/faceDirection Gus 1/speak Gus "威利？你覺得如何？"/pause 400/textAboveHead Willy "唔……"/pause 700/shake Willy 400/playSound eat/pause 600/shake Willy 400/playSound eat/pause 600/speak Willy "蘑菇比去年的更有嚼勁一點……"/pause 400/speak Gus "你覺得好吃嗎？$s"/pause 400/playSound eat/shake Willy 400/pause 600/playSound eat/shake Willy 400/pause 600/playSound eat/shake Willy 400/pause 800/playSound gulp/pause 1300/textAboveHead Willy "嗯，小伙子"/pause 300/jump Gus/pause 400/emote Gus 32/pause 1000/speak Pam "很棒啊，格斯。而且因為不收錢，味道更好了！$h"/faceDirection Gus 2/speak Robin "雞蛋口感很棒，顏色也是金黃金黃的……瑪妮，是你家裡的嗎？"/faceDirection Gus 3/speak Gus "不是……你得感謝%farm農場的@！"/emote Lewis 20 true/emote Marnie 20 true/emote Robin 20 true/emote Pam 20 true/emote Willy 20 true/pause 1000/speak Marnie "嗯……%farm的雞蛋。"/pause 200/textAboveHead Lewis "嗯……"/faceDirection Gus 2/viewport move 1 0 7000/pause 500/playSound eat/shake Robin 400/pause 1000/playSound eat/shake Lewis 400/pause 1000/playSound eat/shake Marnie 400/pause 1000/fade/viewport -1000 -1000/end

Entries.95/e 93/k 94/t 1800 1950/i 136/y 2: 50s/6 15/farmer 4 19 0 Sam 17 13 0 Jodi 7 4 0 Kent 3 15 1/removeItem 136/removeQuest 22/pause 300/faceDirection Kent 2/speak Kent "嗨 @。快進來吧。"/move farmer 0 -3 0/speed Jodi 4/move Jodi 0 10 2/speak Jodi "啊，你能來真是太好了， @！你還帶了魚來！棒極了！"/move farmer 2 0 0/move farmer 0 -1 1/faceDirection Kent 1/faceDirection Jodi 1/speak Jodi "山姆！你進來幫我收拾下魚好嗎？"/pause 300/speak Sam "……遵命。$a"/move Sam -5 0 3 true/proceedPosition Sam/stopAnimation farmer/doAction 12 14/move Sam 0 2 3 false/move Sam -4 0 3/faceDirection Jodi 2/pause 500/showFrame 35/addObject 7 15 136/playSound fishSlap/pause 800/stopAnimation farmer/speak Jodi "哇，看來很棒的樣子……聞起來也很新鮮呢！多謝你帶來的禮物啦， @。#$b#肯特也抓到一條魚，不過那個給他自己吃都不一定夠！$u"/pause 200/faceDirection farmer 3/pause 1000/speak Kent "呵呵。$h"/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 1000/message "唔……這鱸魚真是脆！麵包屑也糊得恰到好處！"/pause 500/message "我現在感覺就像是家庭的一份子。"/pause 1500/end warpOut
Entries.94/e 93/k 95/t 1800 1950/i 136/y 1: 50s/6 15/farmer 4 19 0 Sam 17 13 0 Jodi 7 4 0/removeItem 136/removeQuest 22/speed Jodi 4/move Jodi 0 10 2/speak Jodi "啊，你好！ @！進來！這是魚的味道嗎？"/move farmer 0 -3 1/move farmer 2 0 0/move farmer 0 -1 1/faceDirection Jodi 1/speak Jodi "山姆！進來幫我準備一下晚餐好嗎？"/pause 300/speak Sam "……遵命。$a"/move Sam -5 0 3 true/proceedPosition Sam/stopAnimation farmer/doAction 12 14/move Sam 0 2 3 false/move Sam -4 0 3/faceDirection Jodi 2/pause 300/showFrame 35/addObject 7 15 136/playSound fishSlap/pause 800/stopAnimation farmer/pause 400/speak Jodi "哇，看起來品質絕佳的鱸魚呢， @。多謝你帶來的禮物啦。$h"/pause 1000/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 1000/message "唔……這鱸魚真是脆！麵包屑也糊得十分完美！"/pause 500/message "我現在感覺就像是家庭的一份子。"/pause 1500/end warpOut
Entries.44/f Sam 500/p Sam: sampractice/-1000 -1000/farmer 4 15 1 Sam 17 16 2 Sebastian 18 18 0/positionOffset Sebastian 32 -31/skippable/animate Sam false true 200 20 21/showFrame Sebastian 41/viewport 17 16 true/move farmer 8 0 0/pause 500/doAction 12 14/move farmer 0 -2 1/move farmer 4 0 2/pause 9000/stopAnimation Sam/showFrame Sebastian 8/pause 1000/faceDirection Sam 0/pause 800/speak Sam "啊，你好 @!塞巴斯蒂安和我正「玩音樂」呢。"/move farmer 0 3 1/faceDirection Sam 3/faceDirection Sebastian 3/speak Sam "我們想組建一支樂隊，但是不知要搞哪種音樂才好。選擇實在太多了。"/pause 500/emote Sebastian 28/faceDirection Sam 2/pause 500/emote Sam 16/faceDirection Sam 3/speak Sam "#$q 76 null#說， @…… 你喜歡什麼樣的音樂？#$r 76 50 Event_band1#令人愉悅的流行樂。#$r 77 50 Event_band2#實驗性質的硬搖滾。#$r 78 50 Event_band3#極富能量的舞曲。#$r 79 50 Event_band4#氣氛活躍的鄉村音樂。"/move Sam 0 2 1/speak Sam "你說怎麼樣，塞巴斯蒂安？我們就搞這個？"/pause 300/faceDirection Sebastian 0/pause 300/faceDirection Sebastian 3/speak Sebastian "……好。"/pause 500/faceDirection Sam 0/move Sam 0 -2 3/speak Sam "多謝幫助， @。有了我高超的吉他技術和塞巴斯蒂安的電子琴能力。我們一定會成功的！絕對會！$h"/faceDirection Sam 2/speak Sam "只需要再找個打爵士鼓的就好了……$u"/pause 500/end
Entries.46/f Sam 1000/p Sam: playful/7 4/farmer 7 12 0 Sam 7 5 0 Jodi 17 7 0/skippable/move farmer 0 -6 0/faceDirection Sam 2/pause 300/speak Sam "啊，你好！ @。我正想吃點東西呢。"/pause 500/speak Sam "來，讓我給你拿點東西吃吧。"/faceDirection Sam 0/pause 500/playSound openBox/pause 500/faceDirection Sam 3/playSound dwop/specificTemporarySprite dropEgg/showFrame Sam 33/jump Sam/pause 1000/emote Sam 12/showFrame Sam 12/speak Sam "糟糕……真是一團亂。$s"/speed Jodi 4/move Jodi -10 0 0/speak Jodi "剛剛那是什麼聲音？"/emote Jodi 16/speak Jodi "*喘氣 *$s"/move Jodi -1 0 0/move Jodi 0 -1 0/speak Jodi "簡直太可怕了！發生了什麼事？$u"/speak Sam "$q 80 null#……告訴她吧， @。$s#$r 80 -10 event_snack1#山姆把零食遞給我的時候掉到了地上。#$r 80 50 event_snack2#山姆把零食遞給我的時候被我弄掉了。#$r 81 -50 event_snack3#山姆故意弄掉的。他覺得這樣很好玩。"/pause 300/speak Jodi "$p 80#謝謝你告訴我事實真相， @。不是什麼大事。|山姆，你做了什麼呀？！你這是犯什麼病了？！$u"/faceDirection Jodi 0/speak Sam "真是對不起，媽。我這就打掃乾淨。$s"/emote Jodi 20/speak Jodi "謝了，親愛的。$h"/move Jodi 0 1 1/move Jodi 1 0 2 /faceDirection Sam 2 true/move Jodi 0 7 2 true/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end dialogue Sam "$p 81#你這樣我很生氣。不知你為什麼要這樣對我撒謊。$s|之前的事很抱歉。"

Entries.67/m 10: none/4 5/farmer 4 9 0 Sandy 2 5 2/skippable/move farmer 0 -2 0/emote Sandy 8/speak Sandy "有……顧客？"/speed Sandy 4/move Sandy 2 0 2/speed Sandy 4/move Sandy 0 1 2/emote Sandy 16/speak Sandy "嗨！你好！歡迎來到「桑迪的綠洲」！#$b#你看起來很像艾米麗給我寫的信裡那個新來的農夫嘛！#$b#那麼……前往星露谷的公車線路又開張啦！$h#$b#哦，我好高興啊！$h"/emote Sandy 32/move Sandy 0 -1 0/move Sandy -2 0 2/emote Sandy 32/end dialogue Sandy "請經常來光顧哦，我這裡很無聊的。"

Entries.6/f Maru 500/p Maru: breezy/20 19/farmer 9 20 1 Maru 22 20 1 Demetrius 19 18 0 Robin 13 6 0 Sebastian -100 -100 2/skippable/move farmer 7 0 1/faceDirection Maru 3/faceDirection Demetrius 3/speak Maru "啊，你好！"/move farmer 1 0 1/speak Maru "我和我爸正對土壤樣本進行測試呢。"/pause 800/emote farmer 40/speak Maru "不要害羞嘛！我們正缺人手呢。$h"/move farmer 4 0 1/faceDirection Demetrius 2/speak Maru "能幫我看一下這個燒杯嗎？我去取最後一批樣本。#$b#我去去就回。"/pause 400/move farmer 0 -1 1/move farmer 1 0 1/faceDirection Demetrius 0/speed Maru 4/move Maru -16 0 3/speed Maru 4/move Maru 0 3 2/move Maru 0 1 2/warp Maru -100 -100/playSound doorClose/faceDirection Demetrius 2/speak Demetrius "多謝你幫忙， @。"/faceDirection farmer 3/pause 500/faceDirection Demetrius 0/faceDirection farmer 1/pause 1000/speak Demetrius "瑪魯是個乖孩子。她可是我的小乖乖……"/pause 500/faceDirection Demetrius 2/stopMusic/pause 800/speak Demetrius "我可不想有什麼東西妨礙她光明的未來，你懂我的意思吧？$5"/pause 400/faceDirection farmer 3/emote farmer 8/faceDirection Demetrius 0/speak Demetrius "平時多想想這事吧……*輕笑*$h"/playSound doorClose/warp Maru 6 24/playMusic kindadumbautumn/move Maru 0 -4 1/emote farmer 40 true/move Maru 3 0 1/faceDirection farmer 1 true/move Maru 8 0 1/speak Maru "啊，真是抱歉了。在我不在的時候你們有話題聊吧？"/faceDirection farmer 3/faceDirection Demetrius 3/pause 500/speak Demetrius "……我剛剛在和@說我們測試的土壤樣本的事。"/pause 500/faceDirection Demetrius 2/speak Demetrius "$q 15933 null#我說的沒錯吧， @?#$r 15933 10 Event_Lab_Silence#（什麼也不說）#$r 15933 -100 Event_Lab_Rat#其實，你爸剛剛可神秘了。"/fork DadWeird/pause 500/speak Maru "好的！那麼， @…… 我來告訴你如何使用儀器。"/move Maru 4 0 1/faceDirection Demetrius 2/move Maru 0 1 1/move Maru 1 0 0/faceDirection farmer 2/pause 500/end Maru1
Entries.DadWeird: speak Maru "蛤？爸，你跟他說什麼了？$a^蛤？爸，你跟她說什麼了？$a"/pause 500/faceDirection Demetrius 2/emote Demetrius 28/speak Demetrius "好啦，好啦……我們在說你啊，小寶貝。$5#$b#我想和 @ 說說你的事……但是又怕你難為情……我不該對你說謊的。$s"/faceDirection Demetrius 0/pause 300/emote Maru 28/move Maru 2 0 0/speak Maru "沒事的，爸爸。我們能理解的。#$b#趁樣本還沒結晶我們最好趕緊回去工作。"/faceDirection Demetrius 2/emote Demetrius 32/move Maru 3 0 1/faceDirection Demetrius 0/faceDirection farmer 1/end Maru1

Entries.25/f Demetrius 1500/p Demetrius/p Robin: jaunty/-1000 -1000/farmer -10 -10 0 Demetrius 6 21 3 Robin 5 21 1/skippable/showFrame Demetrius 28/viewport 6 21 true/pause 900/speak Robin "德米特里厄斯，我跟你說的是拿水果來。不是拿番茄來。"/emote Demetrius 8/speak Demetrius "真是搞不懂。番茄就是水果啊！"/emote Robin 12/speak Robin "只要是正常人，說想要水果的時候，要的都絕對不會是番茄的。這與番茄在科學上的分類無關。"/warp farmer 6 24/playSound doorClose/pause 500/showFrame Demetrius 29/faceDirection Robin 2/speak Demetrius "@！你來的正好。你幫我們解決這個爭端最合適不過了。"/move farmer 0 -2 0/emote farmer 8/speak Demetrius "$q 59 null#你覺得番茄算什麼？#$r 59 -30 Event_tomato1#蔬菜#$r 59 50 Event_tomato2#水果"/pause 500/showFrame Demetrius 28/speak Demetrius "我只想告訴你我的觀點。#$b#每次你跟我說些什麼的時候，我都感覺很難做出推斷呢。"/pause 300/faceDirection Robin 1/pause 300/speak Demetrius "但我會盡力的。"/pause 600/emote Robin 20/pause 300/showFrame Demetrius 29/pause 600/speak Demetrius "謝謝你的幫助， @。$h"/pause 800/end

Entries.1053978/n robinDeluxeBed: distantBanjo/-1000 -1000/farmer -100 -100 0 Robin 5 20 3 Demetrius 7 20 3 Maru 8 18 2 Sebastian 3 23 0/skippable/specificTemporarySprite staticSprite TileSheets\\furniture 160 1087 48 64 2.25 18/positionOffset Robin 32 0/viewport 5 22 true/pause 3000/speak Robin "瞧！我的最新作品。$h#$b#是一張用本地硬木打造的豪華四柱帷幔床。"/pause 400/emote Demetrius 8/speak Demetrius "呃……羅賓？這四根柱子有什麼用？我覺得這是在浪費材料。$s"/emote Robin 12/faceDirection Robin 1/speak Robin "朋友，這是「美觀」……你說，是不是大家看起來都覺得賞心悅目？$6"/emote Demetrius 8/speak Demetrius "唔，我明白你的意思了。不過也不能為了美觀影響了這個睡覺容器的實用性和效率啊。"/pause 500/jump Robin/pause 500/speak Robin "我說，有的時候你感覺像是在裝傻充愣，搞得我很惱火。是這樣嗎？$3"/pause 100/animate Demetrius true true 100 18/shake Demetrius 1000/emote Maru 28 true/emote Sebastian 12 true/jump Demetrius/pause 1000/stopAnimation Demetrius/pause 400/warp farmer 6 24/playSound doorClose/move farmer 0 -1 0/faceDirection Robin 2 true/faceDirection Demetrius 2 true/faceDirection Sebastian 1/speak Robin "嘿，@……進來吧。"/move farmer 0 -2 0/speak Robin "看看這個……多虧你收集了那麼多硬木，我才能做出來這張床。"/faceDirection farmer 3/faceDirection Robin 3 true/faceDirection Demetrius 3/pause 300/speak Robin "你覺得怎麼樣？"/quickQuestion #美學設計棒極了#四根柱子看起來有點浪費(break)faceDirection Sebastian 0 true\textAboveHead Sebastian "嗯"\emote Robin 20 true\emote Demetrius 12\pause 2000\move Demetrius 15 0 1 true\pause 500\speak Demetrius "咳咳……呃……我去自閉一會……$5"(break)emote Demetrius 32\speak Demetrius "英雄所見略同……$h"\emote Robin 12 \speak Robin "隨便你們了。$3#$b#我繼續……$3"/pause 1000/speak Robin "既然我把原型做出來了，那就可以在店裡賣了。"/faceDirection Robin 2/speak Robin "嘿，@……這些可能很適合你的屋子！你覺得呢……要買一點嗎？"/faceDirection farmer 2 true/startJittering/animate farmer false true 100 94/jump farmer/pause 200/textAboveHead Maru "媽媽！"/pause 1000/fade/viewport -1000 -1000/end

Entries.2794460/f Sebastian 500/p Sebastian: Hospital_Ambient/-1000 -1000/farmer 1 1 2 Sebastian 9 4 3 Robin -100 -100 2/skippable/doAction 1 3/playSound keyboardTyping/showFrame Sebastian 24/animate Sebastian false true 100 26 27 26 27 26 27 26/viewport 6 6 true/move farmer 0 4 1/move farmer 5 0 1/pause 1000/speak Sebastian "哦，嗨。稍等一下。"/pause 500/playSound keyboardTyping/pause 1000/question fork1 "#他很忙……我還是走吧。#待在原地。"/fork didntLeave/move farmer -2 0 3/speak Sebastian "你要去哪裡？$u"/pause 300/faceDirection farmer 1/stopAnimation Sebastian/speak Sebastian "抱歉……我得在思路被打斷之前，把這一行搞定。"/pause 500/move farmer 2 0 1/switchEvent sebastianRoom
Entries.didntLeave: pause 5500/stopAnimation Sebastian/speak Sebastian "好吧。真是抱歉，我要先把手頭的事情搞定。"/switchEvent sebastianRoom
Entries.sebastianRoom: resetVariable/move farmer 0 2 1/playSound mouseClick/move farmer 3 0 0/playSound mouseClick/move farmer 0 -1 0/playSound mouseClick/move farmer 0 -1 0/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 0/question fork1 "#問問他剛剛在幹什麼。#稱讚他房間的裝飾。"/fork decor/pause 500/stopAnimation Sebastian/speak Sebastian "我有時候會接一些編程的零工。"/switchEvent enterRobin
Entries.decor: pause 500/stopAnimation Sebastian/speak Sebastian "裝飾？哦，對哦……謝謝了。我在牆上貼海報已經貼好多年了。確實有點亂呢。"/switchEvent enterRobin
Entries.enterRobin: pause 500/playSound mouseClick/pause 100/playSound mouseClick/pause 500/playSound Pickup_Coin15/pause 300/emote Sebastian 40/speak Sebastian "是山姆的簡訊……看來他是想找我出去玩……#$b#呃，我今天不太想出門。$u"/pause 500/playSound doorClose/warp Robin 1 1/move Robin 0 4 1/speak Robin "啊，你好！ @。"/faceDirection farmer 3/move Robin 4 0 1/speak Robin "我知道你不想讓我進來……但我今天遇到了阿比蓋爾，她說她在找你。"/pause 200/emote Sebastian 28/speak Sebastian "你有沒有和她說我在工作？"/speak Robin "說了……不過她說她可能還是要來。"/emote Sebastian 12/speak Sebastian "*唉*……大家都不把我的工作當回事。$u#$b#瑪魯在診所工作的時候就沒人去打擾她……難道大家以為我整天就是在網路上閒逛嗎？"/faceDirection farmer 0 true/move Robin -4 0 0/move Robin 0 -4 0/warp Robin -100 -100/playSound doorClose/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 0/resetVariable/question fork1 "#問問他的工作目標。#問問他為什麼不想見到朋友。"/fork noFriends/pause 500/speak Sebastian "嗯，我是想存錢搬家。搬到城裡什麼的。"/emote Sebastian 40/speak Sebastian "我要是上了大學，現在怎麼也賺到六位數了……但我並不想進入企業，過什麼勾心鬥角的日子，你懂吧？#$b#看來，與其讓我和人面對面相處，還是躲藏在螢幕後面要舒服得多啊。$s"/emote Sebastian 28/pause 600/playSound mouseClick/pause 100/playSound mouseClick/pause 300/speak Sebastian "我得繼續工作了……明天之前要把這個模組完成才行。"/animate Sebastian false true 100 24 24 24 24 24 24 24 24 24 24 25 26 27 26 27 26 27 26 25 24 24/playSound keyboardTyping/pause 500/move farmer 0 2 3/move farmer -3 0 0/move farmer 0 -2 3/move farmer -5 0 0 true/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 1000/end
Entries.noFriends: pause 500/emote Sebastian 28/speak Sebastian "*唉*……我喜歡交朋友，但也需要許多時間來獨處。$s#$b#山姆則正好相反……一個人待太久，會讓他發瘋的。#$b#也許正是因為這個，我才如此喜歡電腦……電腦充滿魅力，直截了當，又很無私。在我認識的人裡面，沒幾個有這樣的品格。"/pause 600/playSound mouseClick/pause 100/playSound mouseClick/pause 300/emote Sebastian 40/speak Sebastian "我得繼續工作了……明天之前要把這個模組完成才行。"/pause 300/animate Sebastian false true 100 26 27/playSound keyboardTyping/pause 500/move farmer 0 2 3/move farmer -3 0 0/move farmer 0 -2 3/move farmer -5 0 0 true/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 1000/end
Entries.27/f Sebastian 1500/p Sebastian: jaunty/-1000 -1000/farmer 1 1 2 Sebastian 5 9 3 Sam 3 7 2/skippable/showFrame Sam 24/showFrame Sebastian 28/doAction 1 3/viewport 5 5 true/move farmer 0 6 1/pause 500/showFrame Sebastian 29/pause 500/speak Sebastian "嘿， @。$7"/pause 500/speak Sebastian "山姆和我正打算玩「索拉里昂英雄傳奇：遊戲版」……要不要加入我們？三個人一起更好玩。$7"/move farmer 0 1 2/pause 500/playSound thudStep/faceDirection farmer 1 true/showFrame 117/positionOffset farmer 16 80/pause 600/speak Sebastian "好，開始了……讓我來抽取一張情景卡。$7"/pause 900/showFrame Sebastian 30/playSound dwoop/pause 500/showFrame Sebastian 28/pause 500/speak Sebastian "唔……看來今天的任務是進入死靈法師之塔……從恐怖領主薩爾斯的手中奪回索拉里昂法杖。"/pause 600/speak Sam "好…… @，可以選擇你的角色了嗎？"/pause 500/question chooseCharacter "選擇你的角色：#戰士。我喜歡直截了當。#牧師。我喜歡幫助他人。#法師。唯有敏銳的頭腦才是最鋒利的武器。"/pause 500/speak Sebastian "嘿！我本來還想選這個呢！$h#$b#看來我只好當牧師了。"/pause 500/speak Sam "好啊。反正我最喜歡戰士了。"/addMailReceived choseWizard/switchEvent opening
Entries.warrior: pause 500/speak Sebastian "真是明智的選擇。新手最適合玩戰士了。$7#$b#那我就選法師好了。"/emote Sam 28/speak Sam "那我只好選牧師了。$s"/addMailReceived choseWarrior/switchEvent opening
Entries.healer: pause 500/speak Sebastian "牧師嗎？那可是個很重要的角色啊。$7#$b#那我就選法師好了。"/speak Sam "好啊。反正我最喜歡戰士了。"/addMailReceived choseHealer/switchEvent opening
Entries.opening: pause 500/speak Sebastian "我們開始吧……"/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/playMusic Crystal Bells/cutscene boardGame/pause 1700/message "國王派你和你的同伴前去取回索拉里昂法杖……如果能夠成功，你們的大名將流芳百世，還會獲得數不完花不盡的金銀財寶。"/pause 800/message "經過一個月的長途跋涉後，你登上了一座懸崖，隱約發現你的目標就坐落在前方。"/pause 100/message "在那月光照耀的平原對面，就是死靈法師塔……在塔裡，恐怖領主薩爾斯正從他偷來的索拉里昂法杖中汲取能量，以實現自己邪惡的計劃。"/pause 500/pause 700/updateMinigame 1/resetVariable/pause 700/question fork1 "塔就矗立在你的面前。#從正門進入。不入虎穴焉得虎子。#尋找後門，以免打草驚蛇。"/fork backEntrance/pause 500/updateMinigame 3/pause 50/playSound skeletonStep/pause 100/playMusic bigDrums/pause 500/message "一個骷髏攔住了你的去路。它似乎很難對付。"/pause 900/resetVariable/question fork1 "你要怎麼辦？#與骷髏對戰。#逃跑。"/fork ranAway/pause 500/resetVariable/question fork0 "骷髏衝了過來！#揮動武器。#舉起盾牌。"/fork swungWeapons/pause 600/playSound clubhit/updateMinigame -1/pause 500/message "你成功擋下了攻擊。骷髏向後倒退了幾步，你趁機衝上去，一擊了結了這可怕的生物。"/pause 200/playSound swordswipe/pause 400/playSound skeletonDie/updateMinigame 5/updateMinigame -1/pause 1000/addMailReceived killedSkeleton/message "你小心翼翼地繞開骷髏的遺骸，沿著過道繼續前進。"/pause 900/switchEvent sewer
Entries.swungWeapons: pause 300/message "骷髏的行動太快，你的隊友們還沒來得及發動進攻，就已經中招了！"/playSound killAnimal/updateMinigame -1/pause 1000/message "巨大的力量將你和你的同伴向後拋去。你們立足不穩，滾下了一道陡峭的斜坡，掉進了一個濕乎乎的地方。"/pause 100/playSound dropItemInWater/pause 700/switchEvent sewer
Entries.ranAway: pause 300/message "你沿著昏暗的走廊左繞右轉。冰冷的石頭旋轉著向下延伸，彷彿無窮無盡。終於，你進入了一片新的區域。"/pause 400/switchEvent sewer
Entries.backEntrance: pause 300/playSound leafrustle/pause 500/playSound grassyStep/pause 400/playSound leafrustle/pause 500/updateMinigame 2/pause 600/message "在塔基附近搜索了一番之後，你在灌木叢中發現了一道木板暗門。下面是一架梯子，你和同伴走了下去。"/pause 800/playSound woodyStep/pause 400/playSound woodyStep/pause 400/playSound woodyStep/pause 500/switchEvent sewer
Entries.sewer: updateMinigame 4/resetVariable/playMusic pool_ambient/pause 1600/message "你發現自己身處一個類似下水道的地方。左手邊，一條通道散發著奇異的綠色光芒。右手邊，一段樓梯升入黑暗之中。"/pause 500/question fork1 "你要怎麼辦？#進入左側的通道。#登上右側的樓梯。"/fork wizardDoor/switchEvent podRoom
Entries.podRoom: pause 500/updateMinigame 7/resetVariable/playMusic Hospital_Ambient/pause 1600/message "你站在一個房間裡。左手邊有一架梯子。右手邊有三個囚犯懸浮在詭異的發光容器裡。他們似乎正在接受某種改造。"/pause 500/message "這難道就是恐怖領主的邪惡實驗嗎？"/pause 500/question fork0 "你要怎麼辦？#儘快離開。#摧毀容器。"/fork leave/pause 500/pause 500/playSound swordswipe/pause 200/playSound breakingGlass/updateMinigame -1/pause 1000/message "在讓這些可憐的靈魂安息之後，你和同伴爬上了梯子。"/pause 800/addMailReceived destroyedPods/playSound woodyStep/pause 400/playSound woodyStep/pause 400/playSound woodyStep/pause 500/switchEvent wizardDoor
Entries.wizardDoor: pause 500/updateMinigame 8/resetVariable/playMusic Lava_Ambient/pause 1600/message "在通道盡頭，一扇門出現在你們面前。"/pause 800/message "是時候面對恐怖領主薩爾斯了。"/pause 500/playSound openChest/pause 1000/switchEvent Necromancer
Entries.Necromancer: pause 500/updateMinigame 6/resetVariable/playMusic Lava_Ambient/pause 1600/message "薩爾斯：入侵者？你們竟敢闖入我的住所！"/pause 800/message "啊，原來你們是為了索拉里昂法杖而來……"/pause 800/message "嘿嘿嘿……真是愚蠢。你們很快就會加入我的骷髏大軍！"/pause 500/fork choseWizard finalBossWizard/fork choseWarrior finalBossWarrior/message "恐怖領主薩爾斯射出暗影光線！"/pause 500/playSound flameSpell/pause 800/playSound flameSpellHit/updateMinigame -1/pause 1000/message "你躲開了法術，但你的同伴卻受了重傷！"/pause 500/question fork0 "你要怎麼辦？#治療戰士（山姆）。#治療法師（塞巴斯蒂安）。"/pause 500/fork healedSam/playSound healSound/pause 500/speak Sebastian "非常感謝。 @。$7"/speak Sam "……$s"/pause 1000/playMusic none/message "塞巴斯蒂安放出「淨化之箭」……一道白光徑直擊中了薩爾斯的臉。恐怖領主尖叫著化為了灰燼。"/playSound debuffSpell/pause 500/playSound killAnimal/updateMinigame 9/updateMinigame -1/pause 800/message "你撿起了索拉里昂法杖，將其高高舉起，世界恢復了秩序！"/addMailReceived savedFriends/pause 1000/playSound getNewSpecialItem/updateMinigame -2/switchEvent end
Entries.healedSam: playSound healSound/pause 500/speak Sam "非常感謝。 @。"/speak Sebastian "……$s"/pause 1000/playMusic none/message "山姆衝上去砍倒了薩爾斯，將索拉里昂法杖從他手中奪回，和平與秩序重返人間。"/pause 500/playSound swordswipe/pause 400/playSound killAnimal/updateMinigame 9/updateMinigame -1/pause 1000/playSound getNewSpecialItem/updateMinigame -2/switchEvent end
Entries.finalBossWizard: pause 500/resetVariable/message "恐怖領主薩爾斯在低聲吟誦咒語……"/pause 500/question fork0 "你要怎麼辦？#對薩爾斯施放「淨化光束」。#為同伴施放「護盾術」。"/fork castBeam/pause 800/playSound debuffHit/message "你給山姆和塞巴斯蒂安施加了「護盾術」。"/pause 500/playSound debuffSpell/updateMinigame -1/pause 1000/message "薩爾斯射出數道黑暗能量。其中一道擊中了塞巴斯蒂安，卻被你的「護盾術」彈回，打中了他自己的臉！"/pause 800/playSound killAnimal/updateMinigame 9/updateMinigame -1/pause 800/message "薩爾斯被擊敗了，索拉里昂法杖散發著柔和的光芒。世界恢復了秩序！"/pause 1000/playSound getNewSpecialItem/addMailReceived savedFriends/updateMinigame -2/switchEvent end
Entries.castBeam: pause 500/message "你還沒來得及施展法術，薩爾斯就對你的同伴射出了一道暗影光束！"/pause 500/playSound flameSpell/pause 500/playSound flameSpellHit/updateMinigame -1/pause 800/message "山姆和塞巴斯蒂安被燒成了焦炭……"/pause 500/playSound yoba/pause 800/message "你的法術正中薩爾斯的面門。"/pause 500/playSound killAnimal/updateMinigame 9/updateMinigame -1/message "他尖叫著化為了灰燼。你撿起了索拉里昂法杖，將其高高舉起，秩序與和平重返人間。"/pause 1000/playSound getNewSpecialItem/updateMinigame -2/switchEvent end
Entries.chargeAhead: pause 500/message "你向前衝去，但薩爾斯卻繞過了你，對你的同伴施放了暗影光束！"/pause 500/playSound flameSpell/pause 500/playSound flameSpellHit/updateMinigame -1/pause 800/message "山姆和塞巴斯蒂安被燒成了焦炭……"/pause 800/message "你再次揮起利劍，結結實實地擊中了薩爾斯，他尖叫著化為了灰燼。"/playSound swordswipe/pause 400/playSound killAnimal/updateMinigame 9/updateMinigame -1/pause 800/message "你撿起了索拉里昂法杖，將其高高舉起。秩序與和平重返人間。"/pause 1000/playSound getNewSpecialItem/updateMinigame -2/switchEvent end
Entries.finalBossWarrior: pause 500/resetVariable/message "恐怖領主薩爾斯在低聲吟誦咒語……"/pause 500/question fork0 "你要怎麼辦？#揮舞著長劍衝上去。#用你的盾保護同伴。"/fork chargeAhead/pause 1200/message "薩爾斯對塞巴斯蒂安施放了「暗影箭」……但你及時舉起了盾牌，彈開了攻擊！"/pause 500/playSound debuffSpell/pause 400/playSound parry/updateMinigame -1/pause 1000/message "在薩爾斯準備再次施法的間隙，你揮著劍衝上去，了結了他"/playSound swordswipe/pause 500/playSound killAnimal/updateMinigame 9/updateMinigame -1/pause 1000/message "索拉里昂法杖在你高舉的手中散發著柔和的光芒。世界恢復了秩序！"/pause 1000/playSound getNewSpecialItem/addMailReceived savedFriends/updateMinigame -2/switchEvent end
Entries.leave: pause 500/message "將可怕的囚徒影像拋諸腦後，你和同伴飛快地爬上了梯子。"/pause 800/playSound woodyStep/pause 400/playSound woodyStep/pause 400/playSound woodyStep/pause 500/switchEvent wizardDoor
Entries.end: playMusic Hospital_Ambient/pause 9000/viewport 5 5 true/pause 800/showFrame Sebastian 29/speak Sebastian "嘿，不錯！$7#$b#我用了三四回才通過第一幕呢。$7"/emote farmer 32/pause 1000/speak Sebastian "多謝拜訪……待會見啦。$7"/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 1000/end

Entries.1/f Abigail 500/p Abigail/d Sat: none/-9999 -4/farmer 13 6 3 Abigail 3 6 2/skippable/showFrame Abigail 20/specificTemporarySprite abbyvideoscreen/viewport 9 4 true/pause 1000/playSound Cowboy_gunshot/pause 150/emote Abigail 52/pause 800/playSound Cowboy_gunshot/pause 150/playSound Cowboy_gunshot/pause 150/playSound Cowboy_gunshot/temporarySprite 2 4 27 8 50/shake Abigail 500/pause 150/playSound Cowboy_gunshot/pause 150/temporarySprite 4 4 27 8 50 true/playSound Cowboy_gunshot/pause 450/playSound Cowboy_monsterDie/pause 550/playSound Cowboy_gunshot/pause 150/playSound cowboy_dead/pause 850/emote Abigail 28/playMusic distantBanjo/showFrame Abigail 21/pause 80/showFrame Abigail 22/pause 80/move farmer -1 0 3/move farmer -3 0 3/faceDirection Abigail 1/pause 200/emote Abigail 16/pause 600/speak Abigail "@?"/move farmer -3 0 3/speak Abigail "你怎麼偷偷溜進我的房間，嚇死我了！"/faceDirection Abigail 0/speak Abigail "*唉*……我玩「草原之王的冒險之旅」已經好幾個小時了，卻連第一關都過不去……$s#$b#這遊戲難度也太誇張了吧！$a#$b#呃，要不然就是我技術太差了。$s"/faceDirection Abigail 1/pause 1000/emote Abigail 16/pause 300/speak Abigail "嘿，你要不要和我一起玩玩這一關？有你幫忙應該會簡單些。"/faceDirection farmer 3/farmerAnimation 97/pause 1000/faceDirection Abigail 0/move farmer 0 1 3/move farmer -4 0 0/move farmer 0 -1 0/faceDirection farmer 0/pause 500/globalFade/cutscene AbigailGame/pause 500/faceDirection Abigail 3/stopMusic/faceDirection farmer 1/fork beatGame/pause 600/emote Abigail 28/pause 400/speak Abigail "呃，我放棄了……看來這輩子是過不了第二關了。$s#$b#好吧……至少努力過了。"/faceDirection farmer 2/showFrame 96/emote farmer 40/pause 1000/end
Entries.beatGame: playMusic jaunty/speak Abigail "嘿，挺有意思的！$h#$b#好的，謝謝。@你用手把還真是有一套啊。這倒也說得通。$h^非常感謝。 @。本沒想到你玩操作杆這麼嫻熟！感覺像是很有經驗的樣子呢！$h"/pause 500/emote Abigail 32/pause 1000/end
Entries.3/f Abigail 2000/p Abigail/t 2000 2200/n: echos/-1000 -1000/farmer 13 6 3 Abigail 6 8 1/skippable/specificTemporarySprite abbyOuijaCandles/viewport 7 5/speak Abigail "嘿！我正想著你什麼時候來呢。我想給你看一樣東西。"/move farmer -5 0 0/move farmer 0 2 3/faceDirection Abigail 2/speak Abigail "你看到了嗎？這個就是通靈板。你以前用過嗎？"/emote farmer 8/move Abigail 0 2 1/move farmer 0 2 3/pause 500/speak Abigail "把咱倆的手一起放到板子上……$l"/showFrame Abigail 30/pause 200/animate farmer true true 9999 89/pause 600/speak Abigail "現在，靈魂將把我們領向……$h"/showFrame Abigail 31/pause 500/speak Abigail "快看！在動欸！$7"/emote farmer 16/speak Abigail "第一個字母是……'我' ……"/pause 600/speak Abigail "下一個是……'<' ……"/pause 800/speak Abigail "哇，快看它動的多帶勁！它寫著……'%firstnameletter'……#$b#我 < %firstnameletter……？"/emote Abigail 16/showFrame Abigail 12/faceDirection Abigail 3/stopMusic/pause 200/stopAnimation farmer/faceDirection Abigail 1/pause 400/specificTemporarySprite abbyOuija/playSound swordswipe/pause 900/playSound seeds/pause 500/speak Abigail "哎呀，一不留神把板子打翻了！嘻嘻……$h#$b#這就是個蠢遊戲，沒什麼意義的啦。$9"/faceDirection Abigail 3/emote Abigail 60/faceDirection Abigail 1/speak Abigail "我，呃，還有事要做。你得走了……對不起了。$9"/faceDirection Abigail 2/emote farmer 28/pause 500/move farmer 0 -3 0/pause 800/faceDirection farmer 2/pause 1000/move farmer 5 0 1 true/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end invisibleWarpOut Abigail
Entries.16/f Pierre 1500/p Pierre: Hospital_Ambient/20 5/farmer 20 12 0 Pierre 14 15 0/skippable/doAction 20 11/move farmer 0 -7 1/move farmer -1 0 0/move farmer 0 -1 0/pause 600/faceDirection farmer 1/pause 1000/showFrame 35/emote farmer 8/pause 1000/playSound secret1/stopAnimation farmer/message "你找到了皮埃爾的'秘密收藏'。"/pause 1000/speak Pierre "嘿！誰在臥室裡？$4"/warp Pierre 20 12 true/faceDirection Pierre 0/playMusic ragtime/move Pierre 0 -4 0 true/faceDirection farmer 2 true/showFrame 94/jump farmer/pause 1000/stopAnimation farmer/proceedPosition Pierre/emote Pierre 16/speed Pierre 4/move Pierre 0 -3 1 false/move Pierre -1 0 0/faceDirection farmer 2/speak Pierre "你……你是怎麼發現的？！$4"/faceDirection Pierre 2/pause 200/faceDirection Pierre 0/speak Pierre "快給我！$u"/showFrame 95/pause 300/playSound coin/pause 600/showFrame 0/pause 500/speak Pierre "$q 50 null#發誓你不會把這事告訴任何人。#$r 50 70 Event_naga1#我會為你保守秘密的。#$r 50 -500 Event_naga2#這事應該讓你太太知道。"/pause 500/speed Pierre 2/move Pierre 1 0 2/emote Pierre 12/speak Pierre "*嘟囔*……這下又得找個新的藏匿點了……*嘟囔*$u"/move Pierre 0 8 0 true/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end
Entries.17/f Caroline 1500/p Caroline/p Abigail: 50s/35 9/farmer 31 13 0 Abigail 34 9 1 Caroline 35 9 3/skippable/move farmer 0 -1 0/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 0/speak Abigail "不要再對我的生活指手畫腳了！$a"/pause 500/speak Caroline "喂，別鬧了！我們讓你在讀完書之前住在這裡，一個錢都不花。但看樣子你一點感激的意思都沒有啊！$u"/emote Abigail 12/speak Abigail "不要再讓我內疚了。$a#$b#有你和老爸幫忙，我真的很感激，但讓我按照你們的方式生活，實在是太不可理喻了。$a#$b#我已經不是小姑娘了，媽。$u"/faceDirection Caroline 1/pause 1500/faceDirection Caroline 3/speak Caroline "……你說得對。我很抱歉。$s"/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 2/playSound woodyStep/faceDirection Abigail 2 true/faceDirection Caroline 2/speak Abigail "有人在嗎？$7"/faceDirection farmer 0/speed farmer 4/move farmer 0 1 3/speed farmer 4/move farmer -4 0 2 true/move Abigail -3 0 2 false/emote Abigail 8/speak Abigail "我和你說，這屋子絕對在鬧鬼。"/emote Caroline 40/pause 500/end dialogue Abigail "呃啊啊……$a#$b#抱歉……我剛才在和我媽吵架。$s"

500/speak Harvey "*喘息*……*喘息*……出了。$7"/move Pam -1 0 3 true/faceDirection Jodi 2/faceDirection Emily 1 true/viewport move 0 -1 3000/move farmer 3 0 1/faceDirection Robin 3/faceDirection Marnie 1 Entries.3102768/j 15/H: playful/6 21/farmer 6 29 0 Pierre 4 17 2 Gus 9 26 1 Marnie 3 23 0 Jodi 11 20 0 Demetrius 9 17 3 Morris -100 -100 0/broadcastEvent/skippable/move farmer 0 -5 0/move Gus 0 1 1 true/move Jodi -1 0 0 true/move farmer 0 -5 0 false/pause 500/move Pierre 1 0 2/speak Pierre "歡迎來到皮埃爾商店！有什麼需要的嗎？"/pause 1000/playSound doorClose/warp Morris 6 29/pause 1000/emote Pierre 8/playSound dwop/faceDirection farmer 1 true/pause 50/faceDirection farmer 2/move Morris 0 -2 0/move Morris 0 -5 0/speak Morris "那個……"/pause 1000/faceDirection Marnie 1/faceDirection Gus 0/pause 1000/move Morris 1 0 1/speak Morris "大家快來哦……Joja超市五折優惠券大放送啦！"/jump Pierre/textAboveHead Pierre "五折？！？！"/showFrame Pierre 16/shake Pierre 3000/faceDirection Demetrius 2/faceDirection Jodi 3/pause 1000/animate Morris false true 80 16 17 16 18/pause 1000/showFrame Pierre 0/speak Morris "嗯？有沒有人要啊？"/pause 500/advancedMove Marnie false 4 0/advancedMove Gus false -2 0 0 -3 -1 0 0 -2/advancedMove Jodi false -3 0 0 1/advancedMove Demetrius false 0 5 -1 0/pause 1500/globalFade/viewport -1000 1000/playMusic none/pause 500/warp Marnie -100 -100/warp Demetrius -100 -100/warp Jodi -100 -100/warp Gus -100 -100/playSound doorClose/pause 1000/playSound doorClose/pause 1000/playSound doorClose/pause 500/playSound doorClose/pause 1000/speak Pierre "但……這價格我可比不了啊！這簡直是賠本賤賣！$s"/stopAnimation Morris/viewport 6 18 true/move Morris 0 -3 0/faceDirection farmer 1/pause 1000/speak Morris "失去了這麼忠實的顧客……一定很難受吧。#$b#但怎麼能怪他們呢？^顯然，Joja企業才是正確的選擇。$h#$b#很快，全鎮的人都會意識到這一點。"/faceDirection farmer 1/emote Pierre 28/playSound dwop/faceDirection Morris 3 true/pause 50/faceDirection Morris 2/move Morris 0 10 2 true/pause 1000/faceDirection farmer 2 true/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end dialogue Pierre "唉……$s"
Entries.963113/n pierreQualityCrops: distantBanjo/5 19/farmer 5 23 0 Pierre 5 17 2 Gus 5 19 0 Jodi 5 21 0 Marnie 10 20 0 Robin 2 24 3 Evelyn 9 26 1/hostMail MSB_Pierre/skippable/pause 3000/speak Pierre "格斯，我這裡正有你想要的東西……"/speak Gus "願聞其詳。"/speak Pierre "是一袋原種的有機蔬菜，本地生產的……#$b#經過精挑細選，品質和味道上乘。#$b#過了這個村，就沒這店了！"/speak Gus "聽起來不錯嘛！我在餐吧裡用得到優質蔬菜。多少錢？"/jump Pierre/pause 800/speak Pierre "只！要！……（咕噥咕噥）"/emote Gus 8/speak Gus "什麼東西？#$b#哈哈哈……我還以為我聽到了「25,000 金」。$h"/emote Pierre 40/speak Pierre "呃……就是這個價。確實很便宜吧？"/jump Gus/shake Gus 1000/pause 1000/speak Gus "皮埃爾，你瘋了嗎？我根本買不起，除非我把餐吧賣了！$3"/advancedMove Gus false 3 0 4 9999/move Jodi 0 -2 0 true/move farmer 0 -2 0 false/speak Jodi "我無意中聽到了價格……太離譜了！你應該感到慚愧。$3"/move Jodi 1 0 1/speak Pierre "等等！10,000 金如何？！$4"/textAboveHead Jodi "不可能！"/move Jodi 1 0 1/faceDirection Gus 3/pause 1000/emote Pierre 28/pause 100/proceedPosition Jodi/move farmer 0 -1 0/pause 500/speak Pierre "太糟糕了，@……$s#$b#我以為這個做生意的策略特別可靠。$s#$b#結果發現，即使我貼了個「有機」的標籤，還是沒有人願意以 10 倍的差價買蔬菜。$s"/pause 400/quickQuestion #有得必有失#別那麼貪婪#他們不買我的蔬菜，太氣人了(break)pause 300\speak Pierre "你說得對，做生意總會有風險。"(break)emote Pierre 12\speak Pierre "喂，我也沒有逼別人買啊！如果覺得價格不合適，大可直接離開。$3"\pause 1000\speak Pierre "……不過你說得也有道理。如果我惹惱了所有顧客，那很快就沒有人來買東西了……$s"(break)faceDirection Jodi 3\speak Jodi "@，你的蔬菜賣相很好。是皮埃爾出的價格把我們趕跑了。"\faceDirection Jodi 1\pause 1000/emote Pierre 40/speak Pierre "@，說起來……說不定你今天可以用這個蔬菜做一頓晚餐。#$b#你覺得呢，想要以 2,501 金的抄底價買回去嗎？"/emote farmer 12/end

Entries.719926/t 900 1700/w sunny: spring_day_ambient/-885 8/farmer -500 -500 0 Caroline 5 7 1/mail CarolineTea/skippable/specificTemporarySprite sunroom/viewport 5 8 true/pause 1000/showFrame Caroline 22/doAction 6 7/pause 500/doAction 6 7/pause 1000/showFrame Caroline 4/pause 500/warp farmer 5 13/playSound doorClose/move farmer 0 -4 0/faceDirection Caroline 2/pause 100/speak Caroline "哦，嗨！早安啊，@。很高興你能進來……#$b#我一直想給你展示一下的……這是我的私人日光室。"/pause 500/pause 500/speak Caroline "所以，你覺得怎麼樣？"/pause 500/quickQuestion #很漂亮！#很舒適。#這裡太熱了……#沒有我的農場好！(break)pause 100\speak Caroline "謝謝你！我付出很多努力才布置好的……$h"(break)pause 100\speak Caroline "確實……我走進來的時候，立刻就有幽靜和放鬆的感覺。這裡真的很治癒！"(break)pause 100\speak Caroline "哦？我自己也覺得這種溫暖的感覺很安神。$s#$b#如果你待著不動的話會感覺更好。"(break)emote Caroline 16\pause 100\speak Caroline "哦，不過你是專業的……對我來說，這只是一項愛好。"/pause 500/faceDirection Caroline 1/speak Caroline "你瞧，這裡是我的庇護所……是我能一直找到寧靜的地方……"/pause 300/faceDirection Caroline 2/speak Caroline "在這裡喝我自家種植的茶葉茶也是極好的！來，我們來喝一杯……"/pause 300/playSound coin/showFrame Caroline 20/pause 1000/playSound sipTea/showFrame Caroline 21/pause 500/showFrame Caroline 20/pause 500/playSound sipTea/showFrame Caroline 21/pause 500/showFrame Caroline 20/pause 500/playSound gulp/pause 1000/quickQuestion 喝一杯？#是#否(break)farmerEat 614\pause 1000(break)pause 100\speak Caroline "行，沒事……"/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 0/playSound sipTea/showFrame Caroline 21/pause 500/showFrame Caroline 20/textAboveHead Caroline "真好喝"/playMusic SunRoom/pause 1500/speak Caroline "我很喜歡每天來這裡喝一杯新泡的茶。#$b#這是我自己的小儀式……#$b#呃……容我解釋一下……$h"/fade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 1000/cutscene greenTea/pause 1000/viewport 5 8 true/pause 1000/speak Caroline "我希望能說得通……#$b#有時生活會很忙亂，所以擁有這樣的一項愛好也是很不錯的。"/pause 150/showFrame Caroline 0/pause 200/speak Caroline "這裡隨時都歡迎你過來休息，如何？"/emote farmer 32/pause 1000/move farmer 0 4 2 true/fade/viewport -5000 1000/pause 1000/end warpOut

Entries.decorate: speak Haley "裝修？$s#$b#呃，好吧。$u"/faceDirection Haley 1/speak Haley "這就是你現在最想做的事情嗎？和我……待在這個小黑屋裡？$u#$b#有意思。$u"/faceDirection farmer 0/faceDirection Haley 2/showFrame Haley 22/pause 1000/end dialogue Haley "嗯，這個小黑屋現在看起來好多了……非常感謝， @。$u"

Entries.poppy: pause 100/speak Sam "嗨，大家好。我們是來自鵜鶘鎮的……呃……別人叫我們「鵜鶘人」$8"/speak Sam "$p 20#這首歌寫的是做耕種、採礦和砍木頭。|$p 8820#這首歌寫的是一座海中城市。|$p 8821#這首歌寫的是火車。|開始！$8"/playMusic samBand/animate Abigail false true 118 49 34 35 48/pause 1890/animate Sam false true 236 20 21/animate Sebastian false true 118 42 43 52 53/animate Vincent false true 236 20 8 21 8/animate Emily false true 236 16 17/animate Leah false true 236 30 31/animate Elliott false true 236 36 37/animate Maru false true 236 29 30/pause 31000/jump Sam/pause 400/animate Sam false true 236 22 23/pause 28500/stopAnimation Sam/stopAnimation Sebastian/stopAnimation Abigail/pause 800/stopAnimation Vincent/stopAnimation Elliott/stopAnimation Leah/stopAnimation Maru/stopAnimation Emily/speak Emily "$p 78#讚嘆一聲「哇哦」！這電音很不錯啊！$h|哇！這太棒了。$h"/speak Leah "$p 79#這太棒了！這簡直是全新的酒吧音樂典範！||你們太厲害了！$h"/speak Shane "$p 77#我特別喜歡結尾的處理。|我特別喜歡低音的部分。"/move Sam 1 0 2/speak Sam "謝謝大家！$h#$b#但你們真正應該感謝的是 @！沒有他的幫助，我們根本就不知該去做哪種類型的音樂！^但你們真正應該感謝的是 @！沒有她的幫助，我們根本就不知該去做哪種類型的音樂！"/faceDirection Sam 2/faceDirection Leah 3/faceDirection Penny 1/faceDirection farmer 3/speak Penny "這麼說，你就是這個樂隊的榮譽成員囉？$h"/pause 300/faceDirection Penny 0 true/faceDirection Leah 0/faceDirection farmer 0 true/move Sam -1 0 2/speak Sam "噢！走之前別忘了買一盤我們的試聽磁帶……只要10金！"/pause 1000/mail afterSamShow/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 4000/speak Sam "太順利了！再次感謝你陪我們一起來！$h"/end dialogue Sam "喂。演出大獲成功！再次謝謝你了， @。"

Entries.831125/f Shane 1750/f Clint 500/f Emily: spring_day_ambient/-100 -100/farmer 30 87 0 Shane 30 81 1 Clint 34 81 1 Emily 35 81 3/skippable/showFrame Shane 16/move farmer 0 -5 1 true/viewport 34 82 true/pause 800/speak Shane "好的伙伴們，還記得你們的台詞嗎——$u"/faceDirection Clint 3/pause 300/speak Emily "記得！"/emote Clint 28/faceDirection Clint 1/pause 500/speak Shane "準備好了嗎？開始！$u"/pause 1500/speak Emily "我本以為我們之間有些什麼特殊的情感……看來是我錯了。$s"/pause 500/speak Clint "我……我……啊……"/emote Shane 12/playMusic playful/speak Shane "卡！"/speak Clint "對不起！$s"/faceDirection Clint 3/speak Clint "她這樣衝著我說話，我真的很難記起台詞欸……$s"/emote Emily 8 true/emote Shane 8/pause 500/showFrame Shane 17/pause 500/jump Shane/pause 800/speak Shane "哦，你好。"/faceDirection farmer 0/speak Shane "看看我的新相機。#$b#JOJA可樂公司募集廣告。獎金是10,000g。"/showFrame Shane 16/pause 500/emote Shane 16/showFrame Shane 17/pause 500/speak Shane "嘿！這個鏡頭你來行嗎？#$b#就在克林特和艾米麗對話的時候從背景裡經過……這樣這個場景就更真實了。"/jump farmer/pause 800/move farmer 0 2 1 false/showFrame Shane 16/move farmer 8 0 0/faceDirection Clint 1/speak Shane "嗯……準備好了嗎？#$b#開始！$u"/playMusic sadpiano/speak Emily "我本以為我們之間有些什麼特殊的情感……你說過無論發生什麼都不會拋下我的。看來是我錯了。$s"/move farmer 0 -8 2 true/pause 500/speak Clint "不！不是這樣的……我只是有一件對我來說很重要的事情要做。真的對我非常重要。"/playMusic none/faceDirection Clint 2/pause 1000/playMusic ragtime/faceDirection Clint 1/speak Clint "我想要喝新出的「藍JOJA」可樂。$5#$b#它的甜度是之前的可樂的三倍，而且價格比水還便宜！$5"/pause 600/speak Emily "但……但……碳酸飲料不是不健康嗎？你確定……$s"/pause 600/speak Clint "別擔心，親愛的，JOJA可樂總部的世界級科學團隊已經用實驗證明了新出的藍JOJA可樂不會對胃壁造成任何酸性腐蝕。所以喝多少都沒事。$5#$b#唯一的問題是……「你會什麼時候愛上」？……*咕嚕咕嚕* *咕嚕咕嚕*……啊……$5"/playMusic spring_day_ambient/speak Shane "卡！"/faceDirection Clint 3/move Shane 3 0 1 false/speak Shane "完美。"/move Shane 0 -1 1/faceDirection Clint 2 true/move Shane 5 0 0/speak Shane "多謝幫助！ $h"/move farmer 0 2 2/faceDirection Clint 2/pause 1000/speak Emily "……克林特？$s"/pause 500/faceDirection Shane 3/faceDirection farmer 3/pause 500/playSound coin/showFrame Clint 39/shake Clint 3000/pause 2000/end dialogue Shane "今天真是收穫頗豐……拍出了不少好鏡頭。"
Entries.2481135/f Alex 1000/t 900 1600: sweet/-1000 -1000/farmer 44 65 1 Alex 50 68 1/skippable/specificTemporarySprite joshDog/viewport 53 67 true/pause 3000/speak Alex "真聽話，小灰。"/pause 2000/speak Alex "你大概是唯一一個懂我的人了。$s#$b#只有你和我有共同點。$s"/faceDirection Alex 2/pause 700/emote Alex 28/playSound leafrustle/move farmer 6 0 2/pause 500/faceDirection Alex 0/jump Alex/pause 800/speak Alex "@！你在偷聽我說話嗎？$7"/move farmer 0 1 2/question fork1 "#沒錯，我什麼都聽到了。#沒有……怎麼了？"/fork didntHear/pause 500/faceDirection Alex 2/pause 1000/showFrame Alex 27/pause 600/playMusic desolate/emote Alex 28/speak Alex "我不太喜歡說這個話題，但是我還是解釋一下吧……$s"/pause 1000/showFrame Alex 0 true/faceDirection Alex 0/pause 500/speak Alex "你有沒有好奇過，為什麼我要和我的祖父母一起住？$s#$b#我的父親……不是什麼好傢伙……他……他幾乎毀了我和我母親的人生。$a#$b#從我出生起到現在，有一半的時間他是不在的……而剩下的一半時間，他每天都酗酒度日，然後數落我，痛罵我。$a#$b#我感覺他是在為自己以前的作為後悔……因為在他年輕的時候一事無成。"/faceDirection Alex 1/speak Alex "唔……我是這麼想的，至少。誰知道他腦子裡在想些什麼。$a"/pause 800/speak Alex "有一天，他突然離開了，很快我的母親就生病然後逝世了。我別無他法只能搬到我的祖父母那裡去住。$s"/move farmer 0 1 1/pause 3000/emote Alex 40/faceDirection Alex 0/playMusic spring_day_ambient/speak Alex "你看起來是個很可靠的人……所以我才把這件事告訴你， @。我不需要任何同情。$s#$b#如果說我的過去有什麼使我受益的地方，那就是過去的經歷讓我變得無比堅強。"/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 2/pause 500/speak Alex "好了……現在我就讓你看看小灰吃烤牛排的樣子。$h"/faceDirection Alex 1/faceDirection farmer 1/showFrame Alex 26/specificTemporarySprite joshSteak/playSound dwop/pause 500/pause 500/speak Alex "哈！看他那口水流的。他和我一樣喜歡牛排。$h"/playSound dogWhining/pause 3000/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end
Entries.didntHear: pause 400/pause 100/faceDirection Alex 1/speak Alex "哦……我在和小灰說話。#$b#他和我其實有很多共同點。$s"/faceDirection Alex 2/pause 1000/showFrame Alex 27/pause 600/playMusic desolate/emote Alex 28/speak Alex "其實我不太想說的……但是我們已經認識有一段時間了，我覺得我可以相信你。$s"/pause 1000/faceDirection Alex 0/pause 500/speak Alex "你有沒有好奇過，為什麼我要和我的祖父母一起住？$s#$b#我的父親……不是什麼好傢伙……他……他幾乎毀了我和我母親的人生。$a#$b#從我出生起到現在，有一半的時間他是不在的……而剩下的一半時間，他每天都酗酒度日，然後數落我，痛罵我。$a#$b#我感覺他是在為自己以前的作為後悔……因為在他年輕的時候一事無成。$a"/faceDirection Alex 1/speak Alex "唔……我是這麼想的，至少。誰知道他腦子裡在想些什麼。$a"/pause 800/speak Alex "有一天，他突然離開了，很快我的母親就生病然後逝世了。我別無他法只能搬到我的祖父母那裡去住。$s"/move farmer 0 1 1/pause 3000/emote Alex 40/faceDirection Alex 0/playMusic spring_day_ambient/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 2/pause 500/speak Alex "你猜怎麼樣？過去的就讓它過去把……我不需要任何同情。#$b#我覺得人還是要樂觀一點……我的童年或許不怎麼快樂，但至少它讓我變得很堅強。我不得不這樣。"/pause 1000/speak Alex "快看小灰怎麼吃烤牛排的。$h"/faceDirection Alex 1/faceDirection farmer 1/showFrame Alex 26/specificTemporarySprite joshSteak/playSound dwop/pause 500/pause 500/speak Alex "哈！看他那口水流的。他和我一樣喜歡牛排。$h"/playSound dogWhining/pause 3000/end

Entries.15389722/j 57: springtown/62 93/farmer 54 94 1 Lewis 62 94 0 Robin 64 93 3/skippable/move farmer 6 0 1 true/animate Robin false true 100 24 25 26 27 27 27 27 27 27 27 27/pause 200/playSound crafting/pause 1200/playSound crafting/pause 1200/playSound crafting/pause 1200/playSound crafting/pause 500/stopAnimation Robin/faceDirection Lewis 3/speak Lewis "啊，你好啊，@。你來得正是時候。$h"/pause 500/emote farmer 8/move farmer 1 0 0 true/faceDirection Lewis 0/pause 200/speak Lewis "這是我們新做的「特別訂單」看板。#$b#是我和羅賓一點一點做出來的。$h"/pause 500/speak Robin "呃……劉易斯？你只是幫我拿著釘子而已。"/pause 300/showFrame Lewis 26/playSound slimedead/jump Lewis/shake Lewis 1000/pause 1300/showFrame Lewis 12/faceDirection farmer 1/faceDirection Lewis 3/speak Lewis "咳咳……別管她。$5"/pause 400/faceDirection Lewis 0/speak Lewis "好，我來解釋一下……"/showFrame Lewis 20/speak Lewis "是這樣的……%farm農場恢復營業，讓本地的經濟蒸蒸日上。#$b#因此，有些鎮上的居民想讓我給他們做的生意和個人的項目找一個本地的原材料供應商。"/pause 200/showFrame Lewis 8/faceDirection Lewis 0/speak Lewis "所以我和羅賓想到了一個主意，就是做一個「特別訂單」看板。這樣的話，如果委託太大不適合放在皮埃爾的那塊佈告欄上，就可以貼在這裡。"/faceDirection farmer 0/pause 500/faceDirection Robin 3/move Robin 0 1 3/speak Robin "嗯……比方說，我打算訂一些硬木用來做一個床。$h#$b#我不會為難你，不過如果你想幫忙的話，直接從板子上接單就行。#$b#說不定床能做好的話我會在店裡賣……誰知道呢！$h"/faceDirection farmer 1/quickQuestion #我願意幫忙！#呃……不知道，有可能吧……(break)faceDirection Lewis 3\speak Lewis "我就知道！@啊，你從沒讓我失望過。"\emote Robin 20\speak Robin "那麼，這件事就算「板上釘釘」了？$4"\pause 400\showFrame Lewis 27\shake Lewis 200\pause 400\textAboveHead Lewis "嚯"\animate Robin false true 150 32 33\pause 1200\showFrame Lewis 0\faceDirection Lewis 3\speak Lewis "嗯，你肯定很忙，所以我們也不會耽誤你的時間。#$b#一如既往地感謝你願意為社區做出貢獻！$h#$b#保重，@。"(break)faceDirection Lewis 3\emote Lewis 28\speak Lewis "呃……@啊，沒想到你會給出這種不冷不熱的回答。我有點失望。$s"\pause 400\speak Robin "沒事的，劉易斯。沒必要催著人家幫忙。$5#$b#也許我可以讓塞巴斯蒂安來幫忙。他一天到晚在那裡玩電腦。"\playMusic none\pause 500\speak Lewis "嗯……羅賓，這裡的事情做完了。$u#$b#……就不再浪費@寶貴的個人時間了。$u"\faceDirection Lewis 1(break)/pause 2000/end
